trans-unit.target: zin Ala arabera dizute [musulmanen] behar duzu asetzeko.

trans-unit.source: Do they not know that whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger - that for him is the fire of Hell, wherein he will abide eternally? That is the great disgrace.
trans-unit.target: Ez dute ez jakin duenarentzat kontrajartzen Allah eta bere Messenger - Hori da Infernuko sua da hura, TIIRA eternalki çaudete izango zuen?

trans-unit.source: They hypocrites are apprehensive lest a surah be revealed about them, informing them of what is in their hearts. Say, "Mock [as you wish]; indeed, Allah will expose that which you fear."
trans-unit.target: Dute itxurazaleok apprehensive dira lest Surah bat izango haiei buruzko agerian, horiek informatzea zer beren bihotzetan da.

trans-unit.source: And if you ask them, they will surely say, "We were only conversing and playing." Say, "Is it Allah and His verses and His Messenger that you were mocking?"
trans-unit.target: Eta galdetzen baduzu, ziur aski izango lukete «bakarrik elkarrizketan ari ginela eta jolasten."

trans-unit.source: Make no excuse; you have disbelieved after your belief. If We pardon one faction of you - We will punish another faction because they were criminals.
trans-unit.target: Egin Aitzakia ez;

trans-unit.source: The hypocrite men and hypocrite women are of one another. They enjoin what is wrong and forbid what is right and close their hands. They have forgotten Allah, so He has forgotten them [accordingly]. Indeed, the hypocrites - it is they who are the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: The hipokrita gizonen eta emakumeen hipokrita bat beste dira.

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised the hypocrite men and hypocrite women and the disbelievers the fire of Hell, wherein they will abide eternally. It is sufficient for them. And Allah has cursed them, and for them is an enduring punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ala hipokrita gizonen eta emakumeen hipokrita eta disbelievers Hell sua, TIIRA eternalki çaudete izango dute agindu du.

trans-unit.source: [You disbelievers are] like those before you; they were stronger than you in power and more abundant in wealth and children. They enjoyed their portion [of worldly enjoyment], and you have enjoyed your portion as those before you enjoyed their portion, and you have engaged [in vanities] like that in which they engaged. [It is] those whose deeds have become worthless in this world and in the Hereafter, and it is they who are the losers.
trans-unit.target: [You disbelievers dira] duzu aurretik bezala;

trans-unit.source: Has there not reached them the news of those before them - the people of Noah and [the tribes of] 'Aad and Thamud and the people of Abraham and the companions of Madyan and the towns overturned? Their messengers came to them with clear proofs. And Allah would never have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Du ez iritsi hauen aurrean albisteak - 'Aad eta Thamud eta Abraham eta Madyan eta herrietako laguntzaileak jendea [leinu] Noah jendea eta irauli?

trans-unit.source: The believing men and believing women are allies of one another. They enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong and establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. Those - Allah will have mercy upon them. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: gizonen sinesteko eta sinesteko Emakumeek elkarri aliatuak dira.

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised the believing men and believing women gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally, and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence; but approval from Allah is greater. It is that which is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Ala gizon sinesteko eta sinesteko emakumeen lorategiak horien azpian fluxua ibaietan, TIIRA eternalki perseuera, eta etxebizitzen atsegina betiereko egoitza lorategietan ere agindu du;

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, fight against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: O Profeta, disbelievers eta itxurazaleek aurka borrokatzeko eta izan horien gainean gogorretan.

trans-unit.source: They swear by Allah that they did not say [anything against the Prophet] while they had said the word of disbelief and disbelieved after their [pretense of] Islam and planned that which they were not to attain. And they were not resentful except [for the fact] that Allah and His Messenger had enriched them of His bounty. So if they repent, it is better for them; but if they turn away, Allah will punish them with a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And there will not be for them on earth any protector or helper.
trans-unit.target: zin Allah dute, baina ez dutela esan [ezer Profeta aurka] dute, esan zuen, berriz, sinesgaitza hitza eta bere Islam [asmorik] ondoren disbelieved eta aurreikusita ez zeuden dute lortzen dugula.

trans-unit.source: And among them are those who made a covenant with Allah, [saying], "If He should give us from His bounty, we will surely spend in charity, and we will surely be among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Eta horiek dira, besteak beste, [esaten], Ala itun bat egin dutenei "guri eman beharko balu, sari horiek, ziur aski izango dugu ongintzazko pasatzeko, eta ziur aski izango dugu leiala artean."

trans-unit.source: But when he gave them from His bounty, they were stingy with it and turned away while they refused.
trans-unit.target: Baina horiek eman zioten Bere sari horiek zuen, berarekin zeken ziren eta bizkarra eman zioten uko bitartean.

trans-unit.source: So He penalized them with hypocrisy in their hearts until the Day they will meet Him - because they failed Allah in what they promised Him and because they [habitually] used to lie.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, horiek zigortuko zien bihotzean Bera bilduko eguna arte dute hipokresia batera - Ala huts egin dute zer Bera agindu zuten eta dute [eskuarki] gezurra erabiltzen delako.

trans-unit.source: Did they not know that Allah knows their secrets and their private conversations and that Allah is the Knower of the unseen?
trans-unit.target: Ez al dute jakin Allah bere sekretuak eta bere elkarrizketa pribatuak daki eta Ala ikusezin Jakile da hori?

trans-unit.source: Those who criticize the contributors among the believers concerning [their] charities and [criticize] the ones who find nothing [to spend] except their effort, so they ridicule them - Allah will ridicule them, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: buruzko [bere] ongintza fededun artean Laguntzaileen kritikatu duten eta [kritikatu] ezer aurkitu dutenak dutenek [pasatzeko] beren ahalegina ezik, beraz, horiek irrigarri dute - Ala horiek irrigarri izango, eta zigor mingarria izango dute.

trans-unit.source: Ask forgiveness for them, [O Muhammad], or do not ask forgiveness for them. If you should ask forgiveness for them seventy times - never will Allah forgive them. That is because they disbelieved in Allah and His Messenger, and Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.
trans-unit.target: Galdetu barkamena beraientzat, [O Muhammad], edo ez barkamena eskatu beraientzat.

trans-unit.source: Those who remained behind rejoiced in their staying [at home] after [the departure of] the Messenger of Allah and disliked to strive with their wealth and their lives in the cause of Allah and said, "Do not go forth in the heat." Say, "The fire of Hell is more intensive in heat" - if they would but understand.
trans-unit.target: nor geratu atzean euren ostatu eguinetan [Etxean] ondoren Allah de Messenger [irteera] eta horiek Gustukoak beren aberastasuna eta beren Ala kausa bizitza saiatzen eta esan zion: «Ez joan denari beroa."

trans-unit.source: So let them laugh a little and [then] weep much as recompense for what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, utzi pixka bat eta [gero] negarrik recompense bezainbeste zer den irabazteko erabiltzen dute barre horiek.

trans-unit.source: If Allah should return you to a faction of them [after the expedition] and then they ask your permission to go out [to battle], say, "You will not go out with me, ever, and you will never fight with me an enemy. Indeed, you were satisfied with sitting [at home] the first time, so sit [now] with those who stay behind."
trans-unit.target: Ala duzu itzultzeko bada behar horietako faction bat [espedizioko ondoren], eta gero zure baimenik irteteko [bataila] eskatu dute, esan, "ez zara irtengo nirekin, inoiz, eta inoiz ez duzu me batekin aurre

trans-unit.source: And do not pray [the funeral prayer, O Muhammad], over any of them who has died - ever - or stand at his grave. Indeed, they disbelieved in Allah and His Messenger and died while they were defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez otoitz [hileta otoitz, O Muhammad], hil horietako edozein baino gehiago - inoiz - edo bere hilobi stand.

trans-unit.source: And let not their wealth and their children impress you. Allah only intends to punish them through them in this world and that their souls should depart [at death] while they are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez utzi beren aberastasuna eta beren seme harritu duzu.

trans-unit.source: And when a surah was revealed [enjoining them] to believe in Allah and to fight with His Messenger, those of wealth among them asked your permission [to stay back] and said, "Leave us to be with them who sit [at home]."
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz Surah bat agerian zen [horietako enjoining] to Allah sinesten eta bere Messenger borrokan, horien artean aberastasun horiek zure baimenik [itzuli egoteko] galdetu eta esan zuen, "Emaguzu haiekin eseri [Etxean]

trans-unit.source: They were satisfied to be with those who stay behind, and their hearts were sealed over, so they do not understand.
trans-unit.target: pozik geratu dutenek izan ziren, eta beren bihotzak zigilatu ziren, beraz, ez dute ulertzen.

trans-unit.source: But the Messenger and those who believed with him fought with their wealth and their lives. Those will have [all that is] good, and it is those who are the successful.
trans-unit.target: Baina Messenger eta berarekin sinesten zutenak beren aberastasuna eta beren bizitza borrokatu.

trans-unit.source: Allah has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Ala horiek lorategiak horien azpian fluxua ibaietan, TIIRA eternalki çaudete egingo dute prestatuta.

trans-unit.source: And those with excuses among the bedouins came to be permitted [to remain], and they who had lied to Allah and His Messenger sat [at home]. There will strike those who disbelieved among them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Eta beduinoen artean aitzakiak horiek dugunik Onartu beharreko [geratzen den], eta haiek zuten Allah eta bere Messenger gezurra eseri zen [Etxean].

trans-unit.source: There is not upon the weak or upon the ill or upon those who do not find anything to spend any discomfort when they are sincere to Allah and His Messenger. There is not upon the doers of good any cause [for blame]. And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ez dago ahula gainean edo gaixo gainean edo ez duten ezer ondoeza gastatzen denean Allah eta bere Messenger zintzoak dira aurkitu direnen gainean.

trans-unit.source: Nor [is there blame] upon those who, when they came to you that you might give them mounts, you said, "I can find nothing for you to ride upon." They turned back while their eyes overflowed with tears out of grief that they could not find something to spend [for the cause of Allah].
trans-unit.target: Ezta [dago errua] nork, noiz nahi baduzu etorri direnen gainean ere horiek ematen duten muntaiak, esan duzu "ezer aurkitu ahal izango dut zure gainean ibiltzeko."

trans-unit.source: The cause [for blame] is only upon those who ask permission of you while they are rich. They are satisfied to be with those who stay behind, and Allah has sealed over their hearts, so they do not know.
trans-unit.target: kausa [errua for] The baimena eskatu duten aberatsak diren bitartean horiek bakarrik Bazen da.

trans-unit.source: They will make excuses to you when you have returned to them. Say, "Make no excuse - never will we believe you. Allah has already informed us of your news. And Allah will observe your deeds, and [so will] His Messenger; then you will be taken back to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you of what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: nahi aitzakiak izango dute, izan horiek itzuli duzu.

trans-unit.source: They will swear by Allah to you when you return to them that you would leave them alone. So leave them alone; indeed they are evil; and their refuge is Hell as recompense for what they had been earning.
trans-unit.target: egingo Ala zin dute nahi duzunean itzuli zenieke hori bakarrik utzi nahi baduzu.

trans-unit.source: They swear to you so that you might be satisfied with them. But if you should be satisfied with them - indeed, Allah is not satisfied with a defiantly disobedient people.
trans-unit.target: Zin egiten dute, beraz, pozik egon zaitezke.

trans-unit.source: The bedouins are stronger in disbelief and hypocrisy and more likely not to know the limits of what [laws] Allah has revealed to His Messenger. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: beduinoen urratu eta hipokresia eta gehiago litekeena ez zer [legeen] Ala bere Messenger agerian mugak ezagutu ere sendoagoak dira.

trans-unit.source: And among the bedouins are some who consider what they spend as a loss and await for you turns of misfortune. Upon them will be a misfortune of evil. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Eta beduinoen artean batzuk uste duten zer galera gisa gastatzen dute, eta zain dagoen bihurtzen zorigaitzaren duzu.

trans-unit.source: But among the bedouins are some who believe in Allah and the Last Day and consider what they spend as means of nearness to Allah and of [obtaining] invocations of the Messenger. Unquestionably, it is a means of nearness for them. Allah will admit them to His mercy. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Baina beduinoen artean daude zenbait Ala eta Azken egunean sinesten duten eta kontuan hartu zer gastatzen dute hurbiltasun bitartez Ala eta Messenger invocations [lortzea] bezala.

trans-unit.source: And the first forerunners [in the faith] among the Muhajireen and the Ansar and those who followed them with good conduct - Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him, and He has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Eta lehen aitzindari [fedean] Muhajireen eta Ansar eta nork jarraitu horiek jokabide ona dutenen artean - Ala haiekin pozik dago eta Bera pozik, eta zien lorategiak horien azpian fluxua ibaietan, TIIRA prestatu dute

trans-unit.source: And among those around you of the bedouins are hypocrites, and [also] from the people of Madinah. They have become accustomed to hypocrisy. You, [O Muhammad], do not know them, [but] We know them. We will punish them twice [in this world]; then they will be returned to a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Eta beduinoen inguruan ditugunen artean itxurazaleok dira, eta [ere] Medina pertsona nagusiak.

trans-unit.source: And [there are] others who have acknowledged their sins. They had mixed a righteous deed with another that was bad. Perhaps Allah will turn to them in forgiveness. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Eta besteek duten beren bekatuak aitortu [daude].

trans-unit.source: Take, [O, Muhammad], from their wealth a charity by which you purify them and cause them increase, and invoke [Allah 's blessings] upon them. Indeed, your invocations are reassurance for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Hartu, [O, Muhammad], beren aberastasuna ongintzazko bat, zeinaren bidez haiek garbitzen duzu eta eragin horiek handitzeko, eta deitu [Ala 's bedeinkatzeko] hayen gainean.

trans-unit.source: Do they not know that it is Allah who accepts repentance from His servants and receives charities and that it is Allah who is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful?
trans-unit.target: Ez dute ez dakigu dela Ala nor damuturik onartzen bere funtzionario eta ongintza jasotzen eta Ala dela nor da emendamendutaco onartzea, Merciful?

trans-unit.source: And say, "Do [as you will], for Allah will see your deeds, and [so, will] His Messenger and the believers. And you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you of what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Eta esaten, "[duzularik], for Ala zure eskriturak ikusiko, eta [beraz, borondatea] Bere Messenger eta fededun. Eta izango dituzu ikusezin eta lekuko jakile itzuliko dira, eta emango zuen

trans-unit.source: And [there are] others deferred until the command of Allah - whether He will punish them or whether He will forgive them. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: He horiek zigortu egingo edo horiek barkatu egin zituen ea - Eta [ez dira] besteei Ala komandoa arte geroratu.

trans-unit.source: And [there are] those [hypocrites] who took for themselves a mosque for causing harm and disbelief and division among the believers and as a station for whoever had warred against Allah and His Messenger before. And they will surely swear, "We intended only the best." And Allah testifies that indeed they are liars.
trans-unit.target: Eta [daude] horiek [itxurazaleok] nork bere burua hartu meskita bat fededun artean eta duenak Allah eta bere Messenger aurka borrokatzeagatik izan baino lehen geltoki gisa kalte eta sinesgaitza eta zatiketa eragiten du.

trans-unit.source: Do not stand [for prayer] within it - ever. A mosque founded on righteousness from the first day is more worthy for you to stand in. Within it are men who love to purify themselves; and Allah loves those who purify themselves.
trans-unit.target: Ez stand barruan [otoitz] - inoiz.

trans-unit.source: Then is one who laid the foundation of his building on righteousness [with fear] from Allah and [seeking] His approval better or one who laid the foundation of his building on the edge of a bank about to collapse, so it collapsed with him into the fire of Hell? And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Orduan inork bere eraikinaren oinarriak ezarri duten iustitiá on [beldurrarekin] Allah eta [bilatuz] Bere onarpena da hobea edo inork bere eraikinaren oinarriak ezarri duten kolapso buruz banku baten ertzean, beraz collapsed berarekin sartu

trans-unit.source: Their building which they built will not cease to be a [cause of] skepticism in their hearts until their hearts are stopped. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Beren eraikin eraiki zuten, ez du uzten eszeptizismoa [arrazoia] bat izan nahi du bere bihotzetan, beren bihotzetan gelditu diren arte.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah has purchased from the believers their lives and their properties [in exchange] for that they will have Paradise. They fight in the cause of Allah, so they kill and are killed. [It is] a true promise [binding] upon Him in the Torah and the Gospel and the Qur'an. And who is truer to his covenant than Allah? So rejoice in your transaction which you have contracted. And it is that which is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Ala fededun beren bizitza eta beren propietate [truke] duten Paradise izango dute erosi ditu.

trans-unit.source: [Such believers are] the repentant, the worshippers, the praisers [of Allah], the travelers [for His cause], those who bow and prostrate [in prayer], those who enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong, and those who observe the limits [set by] Allah. And give good tidings to the believers.
trans-unit.target: [Horrelako fededun] repentant, adoratzaile, praisers du [Ala], bidaiariek [Bere kausa], Brankan eta belaunikatu [otoitzean] dutenek, enjoin nork zer da eskuin eta horiek debekatzeko zer oker dago, eta horiek

trans-unit.source: It is not for the Prophet and those who have believed to ask forgiveness for the polytheists, even if they were relatives, after it has become clear to them that they are companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Ez da Profeta da eta, ordea, sinesten barkamena eskatu nahi polytheists da, senide ziren arren, horiek argi Hellfire laguntzaileak direla bihurtu da ondoren horiek.

trans-unit.source: And the request of forgiveness of Abraham for his father was only because of a promise he had made to him. But when it became apparent to Abraham that his father was an enemy to Allah, he disassociated himself from him. Indeed was Abraham compassionate and patient.
trans-unit.target: Eta Abraham barkamena bere aita eskatuta bakarrik delako zion egin zuen promesa bat izan zen.

trans-unit.source: And Allah would not let a people stray after He has guided them until He makes clear to them what they should avoid. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala ez litzateke utzi pertsona bat kaleko zuen gidatu du ondoren haiek argi egiten zuen zer saihestu behar zuten arte.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He gives life and causes death. And you have not besides Allah any protector or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Ala zerua eta lurra Dominion da;

trans-unit.source: Allah has already forgiven the Prophet and the Muhajireen and the Ansar who followed him in the hour of difficulty after the hearts of a party of them had almost inclined [to doubt], and then He forgave them. Indeed, He was to them Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ala dagoeneko barkatuko Profeta eta Muhajireen eta Ansar du jarraitu zion zailtasun ordu batean horietako festa bat bihotzak ia makurturiko izan ondoren [zalantzan ezartzea], eta, ondoren, horiek barkatu zuen.

trans-unit.source: And [He also forgave] the three who were left behind [and regretted their error] to the point that the earth closed in on them in spite of its vastness and their souls confined them and they were certain that there is no refuge from Allah except in Him. Then He turned to them so they could repent. Indeed, Allah is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Eta [barkatu zuen, halaber] hiru nor atzean geratu ziren [eta beren error deitoratu] puntua duten lurra itxita horien gainean bere vastness gorabehera, haien arimak mugatzen horiek eta jakin ez dagoela Ala aterpea ez da salbu ziren

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah and be with those who are true.
trans-unit.target: O duzu, ordea, sinesten, Ala beldur eta direnek egia izan.

trans-unit.source: It was not [proper] for the people of Madinah and those surrounding them of the bedouins that they remain behind after [the departure of] the Messenger of Allah or that they prefer themselves over his self. That is because they are not afflicted by thirst or fatigue or hunger in the cause of Allah, nor do they tread on any ground that enrages the disbelievers, nor do they inflict upon an enemy any infliction but that is registered for them as a righteous deed. Indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Ez zen [egoki] Medina jendea eta horien inguruko ondoren [irteera] atzean geratzen direla Allah de Messenger edo beraiek nahiago dutela bere burua baino gehiago beduinoen dutenentzat.

trans-unit.source: Nor do they spend an expenditure, small or large, or cross a valley but that it is registered for them that Allah may reward them for the best of what they were doing.
trans-unit.target: Halaber, ez da gastu bat, txiki edo handiak gastatzen dute, edo haran bat zeharkatuko baina hori da beraientzat erregistratuta dagoela Ala saritzeko daiteke zer egiten ari ziren bi onenak da.

trans-unit.source: And it is not for the believers to go forth [to battle] all at once. For there should separate from every division of them a group [remaining] to obtain understanding in the religion and warn their people when they return to them that they might be cautious.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez da fededun aurrera joan [bataila] aldi berean.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fight those adjacent to you of the disbelievers and let them find in you harshness. And know that Allah is with the righteous.
trans-unit.target: O duzu, ordea, sinesten, aurre aldameneko horiek nahi disbelievers du eta utzi ere gordintasuna aurkituko dituzu horiek dira.

trans-unit.source: And whenever a surah is revealed, there are among the hypocrites those who say, "Which of you has this increased faith?" As for those who believed, it has increased them in faith, while they are rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: Eta betiere Surah bat agerian geratzen da, ez dira itxurazaleek esaten dutenek, artean "Cein honek gora egin du fedea?"

trans-unit.source: But as for those in whose hearts is disease, it has [only] increased them in evil [in addition] to their evil. And they will have died while they are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Baina dutenentzat bezala bere bihotz gaixotasuna da, ez du [bakarra] handitu horiek gaiztoak [gain] beren gaiztoari ere.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that they are tried every year once or twice but then they do not repent nor do they remember?
trans-unit.target: Ez dute ez ikusi saiatu dira urtero behin edo bitan, baina gero ez dute damu ezta gogoratzen dute?

trans-unit.source: And whenever a surah is revealed, they look at each other, [saying], "Does anyone see you?" and then they dismiss themselves. Allah has dismissed their hearts because they are a people who do not understand.
trans-unit.target: Eta betiere Surah bat agerian dago, begiratu elkarri dute, [esaten], "Norbaitek ikusi al duzu?"

trans-unit.source: There has certainly come to you a Messenger from among yourselves. Grievous to him is what you suffer; [he is] concerned over you and to the believers is kind and merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ez du zalantzarik duzu etorri Messenger bat zeuen artean from.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad], say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne."
trans-unit.target: Baina kanpoan pizten dute, [O Muhammad], adibidez, "me Ala da nahikoa; han jainko no Bera Bera izan ezik bermea dut, eta Great Tronu Jauna da.."

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the wise Book
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Ra.

trans-unit.source: Have the people been amazed that We revealed [revelation] to a man from among them, [saying], "Warn mankind and give good tidings to those who believe that they will have a [firm] precedence of honor with their Lord"? [But] the disbelievers say, "Indeed, this is an obvious magician."
trans-unit.target: Izan pertsona izan dira harritu [errebelazioa] gizon bat, horien artean agerian dugu, [esaten], "Abisatu gizateria eta euangelizatzen eman uste duten a [sendoa] ohorezko lehentasuna izango dute beren Jaun dituztenei"?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is Allah, who created the heavens and the earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne, arranging the matter [of His creation]. There is no intercessor except after His permission. That is Allah, your Lord, so worship Him. Then will you not remember?
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, zure Jaun Ala, zerua eta sei egunetan lurra sortu duten eta gero berak ezarritako Tronu gainetik, materia [bere sorkuntza] adosteko da.

trans-unit.source: To Him is your return all together. [It is] the promise of Allah [which is] truth. Indeed, He begins the [process of] creation and then repeats it that He may reward those who have believed and done righteous deeds, in justice. But those who disbelieved will have a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment for what they used to deny.
trans-unit.target: Harekin zure itzulera guztiak elkarrekin.

trans-unit.source: It is He who made the sun a shining light and the moon a derived light and determined for it phases - that you may know the number of years and account [of time]. Allah has not created this except in truth. He details the signs for a people who know
trans-unit.target: Bera da eguzkiak argia eta ilargia eratorritako argi bat eta zehaztu egin duen fase - hori urte eta kontu [denboraren] kopuru jakin ahal izango duzu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in the alternation of the night and the day and [in] what Allah has created in the heavens and the earth are signs for a people who fear Allah
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, gauean txandakatzen eta eguna eta [in] zer Ala zerua eta lurra sortu du ere beldur Allah pertsona baten arrastoak dira

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not expect the meeting with Us and are satisfied with the life of this world and feel secure therein and those who are heedless of Our signs
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, nork ez espero bileran Us eta horiek mundu honen bizitza pozik daude eta seguru sentitzea bertan eta direnek Gure zeinuen arduragabea

trans-unit.source: For those their refuge will be the Fire because of what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: dituztenentzat bere aterpea Fire izango denaren zer den irabazteko erabiltzen dutelako.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - their Lord will guide them because of their faith. Beneath them rivers will flow in the Gardens of Pleasure
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, ordea, sinesten eta leiala eskriturak egiten direnak - beren Lord gidatuko dituzten dutelako fede.

trans-unit.source: Their call therein will be, "Exalted are You, O Allah," and their greeting therein will be, "Peace." And the last of their call will be, "Praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds!"
trans-unit.target: Haien deia bertan izango da, "goraipatzen zaude, O Ala," eta beren agurra bertan izango da, "Peace".

trans-unit.source: And if Allah was to hasten for the people the evil [they invoke] as He hastens for them the good, their term would have been ended for them. But We leave the ones who do not expect the meeting with Us, in their transgression, wandering blindly
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala herriarentzat lehiatzera zen bada gaitza [deitu dute] hastens zuen bezala beraientzat ona du, bere epe izan litzateke beraientzat amaitu.

trans-unit.source: And when affliction touches man, he calls upon Us, whether lying on his side or sitting or standing; but when We remove from him his affliction, he continues [in disobedience] as if he had never called upon Us to [remove] an affliction that touched him. Thus is made pleasing to the transgressors that which they have been doing
trans-unit.target: Eta affliction gizon ukitzen denean, honako hauek ditu zuen, bere aldetik, etzanda edo eserita edo zutik ala ez;

trans-unit.source: And We had already destroyed generations before you when they wronged, and their messengers had come to them with clear proofs, but they were not to believe. Thus do We recompense the criminal people
trans-unit.target: Eta Dagoeneko suntsitu zuen belaunaldien duzu aurretik noiz txarren dute, eta beren mezulariak zuen haiek etorri froga argi batekin, baina ez uste izan zuten.

trans-unit.source: Then We made you successors in the land after them so that We may observe how you will do.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, ondorengoek egin dugu beren ondoren lurra, beraz, nola egin beharko duzu, ikusten dugu.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Bring us a Qur'an other than this or change it." Say, [O Muhammad], "It is not for me to change it on my own accord. I only follow what is revealed to me. Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz Gure bertsoak dira haiei errezitatu argi gisa lekukotza, nor ez da espero Us, topaketa horiek diotenez, "Ekarri digu Qur'an beste bat hau baino edo aldatzeko."

trans-unit.source: Say, "If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had remained among you a lifetime before it. Then will you not reason?"
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Allah willed izan bada, ez nuke izan errezitatu egiten duzu, ezta litzateke egin zuen ezagutzen al zaizu zuk artean dagoen I mantendu zuen bizitza bat aurretik. Gero izango ez denik?"

trans-unit.source: So who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah or denies His signs? Indeed, the criminals will not succeed
trans-unit.target: Beraz, nor da baino gehiago bidegabea duten gezur bat asmatu Ala buruz edo haren seinaleak ukatzen?

trans-unit.source: And they worship other than Allah that which neither harms them nor benefits them, and they say, "These are our intercessors with Allah " Say, "Do you inform Allah of something He does not know in the heavens or on the earth?" Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him
trans-unit.target: Eta Allah baino beste gurtzen dute bertan ez kalteak horiek ezta haien mesederako, eta, esan dute "horiek gure Ala intercessors dira" Esan, "Ez Ala informatzeko zerbait ez zuen zeruan, ez lurrean, gainean ezagutzen duzu?"

trans-unit.source: And mankind was not but one community [united in religion], but [then] they differed. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them [immediately] concerning that over which they differ.
trans-unit.target: Eta gizateria ez zen baina komunitate bat [erlijioa baturik], baina [orduan] ezberdin zirela.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why is a sign not sent down to him from his Lord?" So say, "The unseen is only for Allah [to administer], so wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait."
trans-unit.target: Eta, esan dute "Zergatik ez bidali zion bere Lord seinale bat da?"

trans-unit.source: And when We give the people a taste of mercy after adversity has touched them, at once they conspire against Our verses. Say, "Allah is swifter in strategy." Indeed, Our messengers record that which you conspire
trans-unit.target: Eta gendetzéc erruki zaporea emango dugu ondoren zoritxarrean ukitu dituela, aldi berean Gure bertso aurka konspiratzen dute.

trans-unit.source: It is He who enables you to travel on land and sea until, when you are in ships and they sail with them by a good wind and they rejoice therein, there comes a storm wind and the waves come upon them from everywhere and they assume that they are surrounded, supplicating Allah, sincere to Him in religion, "If You should save us from this, we will surely be among the thankful."
trans-unit.target: He da nor den lurraren eta itsasoaren arte bidaiatzeko aukera ematen dizu, noiz dira ontziak duzu eta sail haiekin dute haize ona eta bertan alegueratzen dute, han ekaitz haizearen dator eta olatuak hetara heldu nonahi eta bere gain hartzen dutela

trans-unit.source: But when He saves them, at once they commit injustice upon the earth without right. O mankind, your injustice is only against yourselves, [being merely] the enjoyment of worldly life. Then to Us is your return, and We will inform you of what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Baina horiek gordetzen zituen, behin bidegabekeria lurraren gainean konpromisoa hartzen dute eskubiderik gabe at.

trans-unit.source: The example of [this] worldly life is but like rain which We have sent down from the sky that the plants of the earth absorb - [those] from which men and livestock eat - until, when the earth has taken on its adornment and is beautified and its people suppose that they have capability over it, there comes to it Our command by night or by day, and We make it as a harvest, as if it had not flourished yesterday. Thus do We explain in detail the signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: [Horiek] bertatik gizon eta abeltzaintza jan - -, harik eta lurra ditu bere Apaingarririk hartu eta da [hau] bizitza worldly adibide baina euri bertan bidali dugu behera zerua lurraren landareak xurgatzen duten bezalakoa da

trans-unit.source: And Allah invites to the Home of Peace and guides whom He wills to a straight path
trans-unit.target: Ala eta Bakearen Home gonbidatzen eta gidak nori borondateak bide zuzen bat zuen

trans-unit.source: For them who have done good is the best [reward] and extra. No darkness will cover their faces, nor humiliation. Those are companions of Paradise; they will abide therein eternally
trans-unit.target: Beraientzat egin duten ona onenak [saririk] eta estra da.

trans-unit.source: But they who have earned [blame for] evil doings - the recompense of an evil deed is its equivalent, and humiliation will cover them. They will have from Allah no protector. It will be as if their faces are covered with pieces of the night - so dark [are they]. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Baina dute nork irabazi gaizkia egintza [errua] - eskritura bat gaiztoak ordain bere baliokidea da, eta irain horiek estaltzeko.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will gather them all together - then We will say to those who associated others with Allah, "[Remain in] your place, you and your 'partners.' " Then We will separate them, and their "partners" will say, "You did not used to worship us,
trans-unit.target: Eta [aipamena, O Muhammad], Eguna horiek guztiak bildu egingo dugu elkarrekin - Orduan egingo lotutako beste batzuk Ala horiek esan dugu, "zure leku [Geldi], zu eta zure 'bazkide.'

trans-unit.source: And sufficient is Allah as a witness between us and you that we were of your worship unaware."
trans-unit.target: Eta nahikoa da Allah eta zuen lekuko batek zirela berorrek ezjakin of dugu. "

trans-unit.source: There, [on that Day], every soul will be put to trial for what it did previously, and they will be returned to Allah, their master, the Truth, and lost from them is whatever they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Badira, [Day horretan], soul guztietan izango epaiketara jarri dute, aldez aurretik, zer egin da, eta Allah, bere maisua, egia izango dute itzuliko zaio, eta galtzea da horietako edozein dela ere asmatu erabiliko dute.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who provides for you from the heaven and the earth? Or who controls hearing and sight and who brings the living out of the dead and brings the dead out of the living and who arranges [every] matter?" They will say, "Allah," so say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Nor duzula eskaintzen zerua eta lurra? Edo nork kontrolatzen entzumena eta ikusmena eta nork biziak ekartzen hiletarico eta hildakoak ekartzen bizi kanpo eta antolatzen [guztietan] axola?"

trans-unit.source: For that is Allah, your Lord, the Truth. And what can be beyond truth except error? So how are you averted?
trans-unit.target: Dela Ala, zure Jaunak, egia da.

trans-unit.source: Thus the word of your Lord has come into effect upon those who defiantly disobeyed - that they will not believe.
trans-unit.target: Horrela, zure Jaunaren itza indarrean sartuko duten erronka desobeditu horiei, - ez dutela uste.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Are there of your 'partners' any who begins creation and then repeats it?" Say, "Allah begins creation and then repeats it, so how are you deluded?"
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Ba al dago zure 'bazkideen edozein duten sorkuntza hasten da eta, ondoren errepikatzen da?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Are there of your 'partners' any who guides to the truth?" Say, "Allah guides to the truth. So is He who guides to the truth more worthy to be followed or he who guides not unless he is guided? Then what is [wrong] with you - how do you judge?"
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Ba al dago zure 'bazkideen edozein duten egia gidak?"

trans-unit.source: And most of them follow not except assumption. Indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: Eta horietako gehienak ez jarraitu hipotesi ezik.

trans-unit.source: And it was not [possible] for this Qur'an to be produced by other than Allah, but [it is] a confirmation of what was before it and a detailed explanation of the [former] Scripture, about which there is no doubt, from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez zen [posible] Qur'an horretarako to Allah baino beste ekoiztuko dute, baina [da] dela eta [ohia] Scripture, zein buruz ez dago zalantzarik azalpen zehatza aurretik zer zen baieztapen bat,

trans-unit.source: Or do they say [about the Prophet], "He invented it?" Say, "Then bring forth a surah like it and call upon [for assistance] whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: Edo esan dute [buruz Profeta], "asmatu zuen?"

trans-unit.source: Rather, they have denied that which they encompass not in knowledge and whose interpretation has not yet come to them. Thus did those before them deny. Then observe how was the end of the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, ukatu egin dute eta hori ez osoa osatzen dute ezagutza hori eta horren interpretazioa ez du beraiekin.

trans-unit.source: And of them are those who believe in it, and of them are those who do not believe in it. And your Lord is most knowing of the corrupters
trans-unit.target: Eta horietako dira sinesten dutenei, eta horietako jendea ez da sinesten dutenentzat.

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad], then say, "For me are my deeds, and for you are your deeds. You are disassociated from what I do, and I am disassociated from what you do."
trans-unit.target: Eta zuk ukatzen badute, [O Muhammad], eta esan, "For me nire eskriturak dira, eta ez zara zure eskriturak. Egiten dudana zara banandu, eta nik zer egiten duzu disassociated naiz."

trans-unit.source: And among them are those who listen to you. But can you cause the deaf to hear, although they will not use reason?
trans-unit.target: Eta horien artean zauden entzun dutenentzat.

trans-unit.source: And among them are those who look at you. But can you guide the blind although they will not [attempt to] see?
trans-unit.target: Eta horien artean zauden begiratzen dutenentzat.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah does not wrong the people at all, but it is the people who are wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Ala ez du okerreko pertsona guztiei, baina nork bere burua wronging jendea da.

trans-unit.source: And on the Day when He will gather them, [it will be] as if they had not remained [in the world] but an hour of the day, [and] they will know each other. Those will have lost who denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided
trans-unit.target: Eta Eguna denean horiek bildu ditu on, [izanen da] balitz bezala ez zuten mantendu [munduan] baina egunaren ordu bat, [eta] elkarrengandik jakingo dute.

trans-unit.source: And whether We show you some of what We promise them, [O Muhammad], or We take you in death, to Us is their return; then, [either way], Allah is a witness concerning what they are doing
trans-unit.target: Eta erakutsiko dugu ala zer haiek agintzen dugu batzuk, [O Muhammad], edo zuk hartu dugu heriotza, gurekin bere bueltan da;

trans-unit.source: And for every nation is a messenger. So when their messenger comes, it will be judged between them in justice, and they will not be wronged
trans-unit.target: Eta nazio bakoitzean mezularia da.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Eta, esan dute "Noiz da promesa hori [betetzea], egiazkoa izan behar baduzu?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "I possess not for myself any harm or benefit except what Allah should will. For every nation is a [specified] term. When their time has come, then they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it]."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "ez daukat neure burua edozein kalte edo onura zer Allah egingo zenuke ezik. Nazio bakoitzeko da a [zehaztutako] terminoa. Noiz bere ordua iritsi da, ondoren, ez dute ordubete atzean geratzen, ezta izango aurrekoekiko dute [it]

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if His punishment should come to you by night or by day - for which [aspect] of it would the criminals be impatient?"
trans-unit.target: Esan, "jotzen duzu? Bere zigorra behar duzu etortzen bada, gauez edo egunez - bertan [alderdi] hura egiteko litzateke gaizkile Izan pazientzia"

trans-unit.source: Then is it that when it has [actually] occurred you will believe in it? Now? And you were [once] for it impatient
trans-unit.target: Orduan da duela denean [benetan] gertatu izango duzu sinesten?

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said to those who had wronged, "Taste the punishment of eternity; are you being recompensed except for what you used to earn?"
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, nor izan harmed dutenei egingo esan zuen, "Dastatu betikotasunaren zigorra; ari konpentsatuak duzu zer den irabazteko erabiltzen duzu ezik?"

trans-unit.source: And they ask information of you, [O Muhammad], "Is it true?" Say, "Yes, by my Lord. Indeed, it is truth; and you will not cause failure [to Allah]."
trans-unit.target: Eta zuk, [O Muhammad] informazio eskatu dute, "Egia al da?"

trans-unit.source: And if each soul that wronged had everything on earth, it would offer it in ransom. And they will confide regret when they see the punishment; and they will be judged in justice, and they will not be wronged
trans-unit.target: Eta arima bakoitzak txarren lurrean guztia izan bada, hura eskainiko luke ransom ere.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. Unquestionably, the promise of Allah is truth, but most of them do not know
trans-unit.target: Zalantzarik gabe, Ala dagokio edozein dela zerua eta lurra da.

trans-unit.source: He gives life and causes death, and to Him you will be returned
trans-unit.target: bizitza ematen zuen eta heriotza eragiten du, eta beregan duzu itzuli egingo

trans-unit.source: O mankind, there has to come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts and guidance and mercy for the believers.
trans-unit.target: O gizateria, ez ditu zure Lord duzu instrukzioa eta sendatzeko zer bular eta orientazioa eta erruki fededun batean da etorri.

trans-unit.source: Say, "In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy - in that let them rejoice; it is better than what they accumulate."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Ala Bounty eta bere misericordiaz - en utzi duten Pozten; zer metatzen dute baino hobea da."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you seen what Allah has sent down to you of provision of which you have made [some] lawful and [some] unlawful?" Say, "Has Allah permitted you [to do so], or do you invent [something] about Allah?"
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Izan zer Allah bidali du behera ekarri xedapen horietatik egin dituzun [batzuk] sori eta [batzuk] legez kontrako ikusi al duzu?"

trans-unit.source: And what will be the supposition of those who invent falsehood about Allah on the Day of Resurrection? Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of them are not grateful."
trans-unit.target: Eta zer Allah buruz falsehood asmatu nor Piztuera Eguna on horiek suposatzea izango da?

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], you are not [engaged] in any matter or recite any of the Qur'an and you [people] do not do any deed except that We are witness over you when you are involved in it. And not absent from your Lord is any [part] of an atom's weight within the earth or within the heaven or [anything] smaller than that or greater but that it is in a clear register.
trans-unit.target: Eta, [O Muhammad], ez zara [arduratzen] edozein materia edo Qur'an edozein errezitatu eta zuk [pertsona] ez edozein eskritura egin duzula baino lekuko gara denean parte hartzen duten ezik.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, [for] the allies of Allah there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve
trans-unit.target: Zalantzarik gabe, [da] Ala aliatuek ez horietako buruzko beldurra ez da izango, ezta izango grieve dute

trans-unit.source: Those who believed and were fearing Allah
trans-unit.target: Fededun eta ziren Ala beldur horiek

trans-unit.source: For them are good tidings in the worldly life and in the Hereafter. No change is there in the words of Allah. That is what is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Beraientzat worldly bizitza eta aurrerantzean ere berri ona dira.

trans-unit.source: And let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, honor [due to power] belongs to Allah entirely. He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez bere hitzaldian grieve duzu.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth. And those who invoke other than Allah do not [actually] follow [His] "partners." They follow not except assumption, and they are not but falsifying
trans-unit.target: Zalantzarik gabe, Ala dagokio duenarentzat zeruan dago eta duenarentzat lurraren gainean da.

trans-unit.source: It is He who made for you the night to rest therein and the day, giving sight. Indeed in that are signs for a people who listen.
trans-unit.target: He nor zuretzat gauean bertan atseden hartzeko eta eguna, ikusmena ematen da.

trans-unit.source: They have said, "Allah has taken a son." Exalted is He; He is the [one] Free of need. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth. You have no authority for this [claim]. Do you say about Allah that which you do not know?
trans-unit.target: esan dute, "Ala seme bat hartu du."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Izan ere, Ala buruz falsehood asmatu dutenek ez du arrakasta."

trans-unit.source: [For them is brief] enjoyment in this world; then to Us is their return; then We will make them taste the severe punishment because they used to disbelieve
trans-unit.target: Mundu honetan gozamena [Beraientzat laburra da];

trans-unit.source: And recite to them the news of Noah, when he said to his people, "O my people, if my residence and my reminding of the signs of Allah has become burdensome upon you - then I have relied upon Allah. So resolve upon your plan and [call upon] your associates. Then let not your plan be obscure to you. Then carry it out upon me and do not give me respite.
trans-unit.target: Eta haiei errezitatu Noah, noiz esan bere herriari zuen albisteak, "Ene herri, nire egoitza eta nire Ala seinaleak gogorarazten ditu zure gainean astun bihurtu bada -. Ondoren I Ala haren bermea Beraz, zure plan haren konpontzeko

trans-unit.source: And if you turn away [from my advice] then no payment have I asked of you. My reward is only from Allah, and I have been commanded to be of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Eta kanpoan piztu duzu bada [nire aholkua from] ondoren, ordainketa ez duzu galdetu nion.

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so We saved him and those with him in the ship and made them successors, and We drowned those who denied Our signs. Then see how was the end of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: Eta hura ukatu dute, beraz, eta berarekin gordeko dugu ontzian eta horiek egin ondorengoek, eta nork ukatu Gure zeinu horiek ito dugu.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent after him messengers to their peoples, and they came to them with clear proofs. But they were not to believe in that which they had denied before. Thus We seal over the hearts of the transgressors
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, bere ondoren, mezulariak igorri dugu beren herrien, eta horiek batera iritsi ziren froga argiak dituzten.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent after them Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his establishment with Our signs, but they behaved arrogantly and were a criminal people
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, horiek Moises eta Aaron faraoiagana eta haren Gure seinaleak establezimenduaren ondoren bidaliko dugu, baina harrokeriaz jokatzen zuten eta ez ziren pertsona penal bat

trans-unit.source: So when there came to them the truth from Us, they said, "Indeed, this is obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ez da haiengana egia Us batetik, esan dute, "Izan ere, hau da aurkariaren magia da."

trans-unit.source: Moses said, "Do you say [thus] about the truth when it has come to you? Is this magic? But magicians will not succeed."
trans-unit.target: Moisesek esan zien: «Ba egia diozu [hunela] duzunean du etorri? Magiko hau? Baina magoak ez du arrakasta."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you come to us to turn us away from that upon which we found our fathers and so that you two may have grandeur in the land? And we are not believers in you."
trans-unit.target: Esan zuten, "Orain heldu diguzu gurekin piztu kanpoan horretan, gure aiten aurkitu dugu, eta beraz, bi lur handitasuna izan daiteke? Eta ez gara duzu fededun joatea».

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh said, "Bring to me every learned magician."
trans-unit.target: Faraoiak esan, "me ekarri ikasi mago guztietan."

trans-unit.source: So when the magicians came, Moses said to them, "Throw down whatever you will throw."
trans-unit.target: Beraz, magoak iritsi zen, Moisesek esan zien: «Bota behera edozein dela bota duzu."

trans-unit.source: And when they had thrown, Moses said, "What you have brought is [only] magic. Indeed, Allah will expose its worthlessness. Indeed, Allah does not amend the work of corrupters.
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz bota zuten, Moisesek esan zien: «Zer ekarri duzu da [bakarra] magia. Izan ere, Ala bere desbalioaz busti egingo. Izan ere, Ala ez du usteltzaileak lana aldatzeko.

trans-unit.source: And Allah will establish the truth by His words, even if the criminals dislike it."
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala egia ezarriko du bere hitzak arabera, gaizkile dislike bada ere. "

trans-unit.source: But no one believed Moses, except [some] youths among his people, for fear of Pharaoh and his establishment that they would persecute them. And indeed, Pharaoh was haughty within the land, and indeed, he was of the transgressors
trans-unit.target: Baina inork ez sinetsi Moises, gazteek [batzuk] bere herriaren artean, Faraoiaren beldurrez eta bere establezimenduan ezik, persegituko lukete.

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "O my people, if you have believed in Allah, then rely upon Him, if you should be Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Moisesek esan, "Ene herri, duzu Ala ere uste bazuen, orduan haren gainean oinarritzea, musulmanak izan behar izanez gero."

trans-unit.source: So they said, "Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people
trans-unit.target: Beraz, esan dute, "Bazen Ala ez dugu konfiantza. Gure Jauna, guri ez trial [objektuei] wrongdoing herriarentzat

trans-unit.source: And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people."
trans-unit.target: Eta gorde gurekin Zure erruki by the sinesgarritasuna pertsona batetik. "

trans-unit.source: And We inspired to Moses and his brother, "Settle your people in Egypt in houses and make your houses [facing the] qiblah and establish prayer and give good tidings to the believers."
trans-unit.target: Eta inspiratu dugu Moises eta bere anaiari, "konpontzeke zure herria Egiptotik etxeak eta etxeak egiteko qiblah [begira] eta otoitz ezartzea eta euangelizatzen eman fededun izateko."

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "Our Lord, indeed You have given Pharaoh and his establishment splendor and wealth in the worldly life, our Lord, that they may lead [men] astray from Your way. Our Lord, obliterate their wealth and harden their hearts so that they will not believe until they see the painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Moisesek esan, "Gure Jauna, hain zuzen ere, aipatu dituzu Faraoiaren eta bere establezimenduan distira eta aberastasuna worldly bizitza, gure Iaunean, eramango ahal izango dute [gizonak] astray Zure bide batetik. Gure Jauna, ezabatu beren aberastasuna eta beren bihotzak gogortzen orain

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Your supplication has been answered." So remain on a right course and follow not the way of those who do not know."
trans-unit.target: [Ala] esan zuen, "Zure erregua erantzun da."

trans-unit.source: And We took the Children of Israel across the sea, and Pharaoh and his soldiers pursued them in tyranny and enmity until, when drowning overtook him, he said, "I believe that there is no deity except that in whom the Children of Israel believe, and I am of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Eta Israelgo semeek eraman genuen itsasoan zehar, eta faraoiaren eta bere soldaduak atzetik zituztela tirania arerio denean ito aurreratu zion, arte, esan zuen, "ez dagoela jainko ez dagoela salbu nori in Israel haurrak uste da, nire ustez,

trans-unit.source: Now? And you had disobeyed [Him] before and were of the corrupters?
trans-unit.target: Orain?

trans-unit.source: So today We will save you in body that you may be to those who succeed you a sign. And indeed, many among the people, of Our signs, are heedless
trans-unit.target: Beraz, gaur egun, gorde egingo dugu gorputzean duten arrakasta seinale bat dutenei duzula izan daiteke.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainty settled the Children of Israel in an agreeable settlement and provided them with good things. And they did not differ until [after] knowledge had come to them. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ
trans-unit.target: Eta ziurtasun bizitzera Israelgo Children atseginez likidazioa eta, betiere, horiek gauza ona izan dugu.

trans-unit.source: So if you are in doubt, [O Muhammad], about that which We have revealed to you, then ask those who have been reading the Scripture before you. The truth has certainly come to you from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.
trans-unit.target: Baita zuk zalantzarik izanez gero, [O Muhammad], zein buruz dizugu agerian, orduan galdetu izan diren Idazteunak irakurtzen duzu aurretik.

trans-unit.source: And never be of those who deny the signs of Allah and [thus] be among the losers.
trans-unit.target: Eta inoiz Ala seinaleak ukatzen dutenek eta [hunela] galtzaileen artean izan horiek izan.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those upon whom the word of your Lord has come into effect will not believe,
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, nori Bazen zure Jaunaren itza ditu indarrean sartuko horiek ez du uste,

trans-unit.source: Even if every sign should come to them, until they see the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Nahiz eta seinale guztietan haiek etorri behar, mingarria zigor ikusi arte.

trans-unit.source: Then has there not been a [single] city that believed so its faith benefited it except the people of Jonah? When they believed, We removed from them the punishment of disgrace in worldly life and gave them enjoyment for a time.
trans-unit.target: Gero ha ez zuten bat [single] hiriaren dela uste da, beraz, bere fedea etekina atera zuen Jonas jendea ezik?

trans-unit.source: And had your Lord willed, those on earth would have believed - all of them entirely. Then, [O Muhammad], would you compel the people in order that they become believers?
trans-unit.target: Eta izan zure Lord willed, lurrean horiek uste izango zukeen - horiek guztiak oso-osorik.

trans-unit.source: And it is not for a soul to believe except by permission of Allah, and He will place defilement upon those who will not use reason.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez da arima bat Ala baimenik arabera ezik sinetsi, eta satsutassun jarriko Berak ez dizu arrazoirik erabili direnen gainean.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Observe what is in the heavens and earth." But of no avail will be signs or warners to a people who do not believe
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Behatu zer zerua eta lurra da."

trans-unit.source: So do they wait except for like [what occurred in] the days of those who passed on before them? Say, "Then wait; indeed, I am with you among those who wait."
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ez itxaron bezala gainditu duten on hauen aurrean egunetan [zer gertatu] salbu dute?

trans-unit.source: Then We will save our messengers and those who have believed. Thus, it is an obligation upon Us that We save the believers
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, gure mezulariak eta, ordea, sinesten dutenek gorde egingo dugu.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "O people, if you are in doubt as to my religion - then I do not worship those which you worship besides Allah; but I worship Allah, who causes your death. And I have been commanded to be of the believers
trans-unit.target: Esan, [O Muhammad], "O pertsonak, zauden Zalantzarik izanez gero, nire erlijioa den bezala -, ondoren, ez dut bertan gurtzen Allah gain duzu horiek gurtzen, baina Ala, zure heriotza eragiten gurtzen I Eta izan manatu nuen nahi izan.

trans-unit.source: And [commanded], 'Direct your face toward the religion, inclining to truth, and never be of those who associate others with Allah;
trans-unit.target: Eta [manatu], 'Bideratu aurpegia erlijioa aldera, egia nahi baitzuen, eta inoiz erlazionatuko duten beste batzuk Ala horiek bete beharko dituzte;

trans-unit.source: And do not invoke besides Allah that which neither benefits you nor harms you, for if you did, then indeed you would be of the wrongdoers.'"
trans-unit.target: Eta ez Allah gain deitzen dioten hori ez onurak duzu ezta kalteak duzu, zuretzat egin bada, ondoren, hain zuzen ere, zuk malhechores izango litzateke. ' "

trans-unit.source: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him; and if He intends for you good, then there is no repeller of His bounty. He causes it to reach whom He wills of His servants. And He is the Forgiving, the Merciful
trans-unit.target: Eta Allah duzu ukitu behar bada zoritxarren, ez duela Remover Bera izan ezik;

trans-unit.source: Say, "O mankind, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul, and whoever goes astray only goes astray [in violation] against it. And I am not over you a manager."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "O gizateria, egia zaudela zure Jauna, beraz duenarentzat gidatuta bakarrik [onerako] bere arima, eta duenarentzat doa gidatuta astray bakarrik doa astray [urratzen] haren aurka. Eta ez naiz

trans-unit.source: And follow what is revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and be patient until Allah will judge. And He is the best of judges.
trans-unit.target: Eta jarraitu da, [O Muhammad] agerian, eta pazientzia izan Ala arte epaituko ditu.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book whose verses are perfected and then presented in detail from [one who is] Wise and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Ra.

trans-unit.source: [Through a messenger, saying], "Do not worship except Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a warner and a bringer of good tidings,"
trans-unit.target: [Mezulari baten bidez, esanez], "Ez gurtzen Allah izan ezik. Izan ere, banaiz Bera Warner bat eta berri onen ekarle bat,"

trans-unit.source: And [saying], "Seek forgiveness of your Lord and repent to Him, [and] He will let you enjoy a good provision for a specified term and give every doer of favor his favor. But if you turn away, then indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a great Day.
trans-unit.target: Eta [esaten], "Eskatu zure Jaunaren barkamena eta damu Harekin, [eta] epe jakin batez xedapen on bat gozatzeko aukera emango dizu zuen eta alde duenarentzat guztietan bere aldeko eman. Baina piztu duzu kanpoan, ondoren, bada, hain zuzen ere, I

trans-unit.source: To Allah is your return, and He is over all things competent."
trans-unit.target: Ala zure bueltan, eta gauza guztiak eskumena baino gehiago zituen. "

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, they the disbelievers turn away their breasts to hide themselves from Him. Unquestionably, [even] when they cover themselves in their clothing, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Zalantzarik gabe, dute disbelievers piztu kanpoan bere bularrak burua ezkutatzeko beregan.

trans-unit.source: And there is no creature on earth but that upon Allah is its provision, and He knows its place of dwelling and place of storage. All is in a clear register.
trans-unit.target: Eta han lurrean izaki ez baina Allah gainean, bere xedapen da, eta bere etxebizitzaren eta biltegiratze lekua lekua daki.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the heavens and the earth in six days - and His Throne had been upon water - that He might test you as to which of you is best in deed. But if you say, "Indeed, you are resurrected after death," those who disbelieve will surely say, "This is not but obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: Eta nor zerua eta sei egunetan lurra sortu zuen - eta bere Tronu zuen uraren gainean izan - He zuk probatu liteke duzu zein da onena eskritura gisa.

trans-unit.source: And if We hold back from them the punishment for a limited time, they will surely say, "What detains it?" Unquestionably, on the Day it comes to them, it will not be averted from them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Eta atzera eduki dugu haiengandik bada zigorra denbora mugatu batean, ziur aski izango lukete «Zer gelditzen da?"

trans-unit.source: And if We give man a taste of mercy from Us and then We withdraw it from him, indeed, he is despairing and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Eta gizon Us batetik erruki zaporea emango dugu eta gero, gero, hura baliogabetzeko harengandik dugu, hain zuzen ere, etsituta eta esker txarreko zuen.

trans-unit.source: But if We give him a taste of favor after hardship has touched him, he will surely say, "Bad times have left me." Indeed, he is exultant and boastful -
trans-unit.target: Baina hura eman dugu favor zaporea bada ondoren oinaze du ukitu zion, ziur aski izango zuen esan, "Bad aldiz utzi dute me."

trans-unit.source: Except for those who are patient and do righteous deeds; those will have forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: gaixoaren dutenentzat eta leiala eskriturak egin ezik;

trans-unit.source: Then would you possibly leave [out] some of what is revealed to you, or is your breast constrained by it because they say, "Why has there not been sent down to him a treasure or come with him an angel?" But you are only a warner. And Allah is Disposer of all things.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren litzateke, seguru asko utzi duzu [out] zer da agerian, edo zure bularreko da mugatzen, esaten baitute da batzuk "Zergatik ez bidali da behera zion altxor bat edo berarekin etortzen aingeru bat?"

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Say, "Then bring ten surahs like it that have been invented and call upon [for assistance] whomever you can besides Allah, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: Edo esan dute, "asmatu zuen"?

trans-unit.source: And if they do not respond to you - then know that the Qur'an was revealed with the knowledge of Allah and that there is no deity except Him. Then, would you [not] be Muslims?
trans-unit.target: Eta ez badute erantzuten - ezagutzen Qur'an duten Ala ezagutza agerian zen eta han egingo jainko no Bera izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: Whoever desires the life of this world and its adornments - We fully repay them for their deeds therein, and they therein will not be deprived.
trans-unit.target: Edonor mundu hau eta bere apaingarri bizitzari desioak - erabat kitatu dugu horiek euren eskriturak bertan, eta dute bertan eta, ez da kenduko.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones for whom there is not in the Hereafter but the Fire. And lost is what they did therein, and worthless is what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Horiek direnak norentzat ez dago, baina aurrerantzean Fire daude.

trans-unit.source: So is one who [stands] upon a clear evidence from his Lord [like the aforementioned]? And a witness from Him follows it, and before it was the Scripture of Moses to lead and as mercy. Those [believers in the former revelations] believe in the Qur'an. But whoever disbelieves in it from the [various] factions - the Fire is his promised destination. So be not in doubt about it. Indeed, it is the truth from your Lord, but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, nor [nabarmentzen] bere Lord [aipatutako bezalako] froga argi bat gainean da?

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than he who invents a lie about Allah? Those will be presented before their Lord, and the witnesses will say, "These are the ones who lied against their Lord." Unquestionably, the curse of Allah is upon the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Eta nor da baino gehiago bidegabea Allah buruzko gezur bat asmatu?

trans-unit.source: Who averted [people] from the way of Allah and sought to make it [seem] deviant while they, concerning the Hereafter, were disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Nor Averted [pertsona] Ala bide batetik eta jabe izan dadin [badirudi] galduan Hereafter buruzko dute, berriz, disbelievers ziren.

trans-unit.source: Those were not causing failure [to Allah] on earth, nor did they have besides Allah any protectors. For them the punishment will be multiplied. They were not able to hear, nor did they see.
trans-unit.target: Horiek izan ziren, ez porrota eragiten [Ala] lurrean, ezta Allah gain edozein babesak dute.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones who will have lost themselves, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Horiek dutenak, galdu egingo dute beraiek, eta galtzea zer den asmatu erabiliko dute, hau da, horiek dira.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, it is they in the Hereafter who will be the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: Zinez dute da aurrerantzean nor galtzaile handienak izango da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds and humbled themselves to their Lord - those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide eternally therein.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, izan duten sinetsi eta leiala eskriturak egin eta apal beraiek beren Jaun - horiek Paradise laguntzaileak dira;

trans-unit.source: The example of the two parties is like the blind and deaf, and the seeing and hearing. Are they equal in comparison? Then, will you not remember?
trans-unit.target: bi aldeen adibide Itsu eta gor, eta ikusten eta entzumena bezalakoa da.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Indeed, I am to you a clear warner
trans-unit.target: Eta izan zalantzarik bidaliko dugu Noah bere jendea, [esaten] den, "Izan ere, nago argi Warner bat nahi dut

trans-unit.source: That you not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a painful day."
trans-unit.target: Ez duzula gurtzen Allah izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: So the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "We do not see you but as a man like ourselves, and we do not see you followed except by those who are the lowest of us [and] at first suggestion. And we do not see in you over us any merit; rather, we think you are liars."
trans-unit.target: Beraz, nork bere herriaren sinesten dutenen artean ospetsuren esan du, "ez dugu ikusiko duzu, baina gu bezalako gizon bat bezala, eta ez dugu ikusten jarraitzeko dutenek gurekin [eta] txikiena dira lehen iradokizun baldin badira. Eta dugu

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people have you considered: if I should be upon clear evidence from my Lord while He has given me mercy from Himself but it has been made unapparent to you, should we force it upon you while you are averse to it?
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Ene herri jotzen duzu: ene Jauna froga argi haren badut behar zuen izan ditu erruki eman dit bitartean berak, baina gaur egin nahi unapparent egin da, behar da behartu dugu haren zara averse bitartean

trans-unit.source: And O my people, I ask not of you for it any wealth. My reward is not but from Allah. And I am not one to drive away those who have believed. Indeed, they will meet their Lord, but I see that you are a people behaving ignorantly.
trans-unit.target: Eta ene herri, zuk ez galdetu nuen inolako aberastasuna.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, who would protect me from Allah if I drove them away? Then will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Eta ene herri, nor me babesteko litzateke Ala batetik bota nituen kanpoan bada?

trans-unit.source: And I do not tell you that I have the depositories [containing the provision] of Allah or that I know the unseen, nor do I tell you that I am an angel, nor do I say of those upon whom your eyes look down that Allah will never grant them any good. Allah is most knowing of what is within their souls. Indeed, I would then be among the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Eta ez dut esango dizu Gordailuko du Ala edo ikusezin ezagutzen dut, eta ez duzu esango dut nago aingeru bat dela, eta ez nori Bazen horiek esaten dut hori [emateagatik daukan] zure begiak begiratu behera Ala duten dudala

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Noah, you have disputed us and been frequent in dispute of us. So bring us what you threaten us, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Esan zuten, "O Noah, eztabaidatua gaituzu eta izan maiz gurekin gatazka. Beraz, ekarri digu zer mehatxatzen duzu, egiazkoa izan behar bada."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Allah will only bring it to you if He wills, and you will not cause [Him] failure.
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Allah bakarrik izango du ekarri nahi zuen borondateak bada, eta ez da izango duzu eragingo [Bera] porrota.

trans-unit.source: And my advice will not benefit you - although I wished to advise you - If Allah should intend to put you in error. He is your Lord, and to Him you will be returned."
trans-unit.target: Eta nire aholkua ez da mesede duzu - Ala zuk jarri error asmorik behar bada - aholku eman nahi nuen arren.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say [about Prophet Muhammad], "He invented it"? Say, "If I have invented it, then upon me is [the consequence of] my crime; but I am innocent of what [crimes] you commit."
trans-unit.target: Edo ez [Profeta Muhammad buruz], "asmatu zuen" esan dute?

trans-unit.source: And it was revealed to Noah that, "No one will believe from your people except those who have already believed, so do not be distressed by what they have been doing.
trans-unit.target: Eta Noah zen agerian, "inork ez du zure duten pertsonek dagoeneko uste izan dutenak izan ezik, uste, beraz, ez da zer egiten dute bada kezkatuta.

trans-unit.source: And construct the ship under Our observation and Our inspiration and do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are [to be] drowned."
trans-unit.target: Eta eraikitzeko ontziaren azpian Gure behaketa eta Gure inspirazio eta ez nor izan harmed horiei dagokienez jorratuko biok;

trans-unit.source: And he constructed the ship, and whenever an assembly of the eminent of his people passed by him, they ridiculed him. He said, "If you ridicule us, then we will ridicule you just as you ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Eta itsasontzia eraiki zuen, eta, betiere, bere pertsona hura gainditu of ospetsuek muntaia, hura barregarri dute.

trans-unit.source: And you are going to know who will get a punishment that will disgrace him [on earth] and upon whom will descend an enduring punishment [in the Hereafter]."
trans-unit.target: Eta nor zigor bat dela zion [lurrean] eta nori gainean lotsagarri izango iraunkorrak zigor bat [aurrerantzean] jaitsi egingo lortuko ezagutzen zoazen. "

trans-unit.source: [So it was], until when Our command came and the oven overflowed, We said, "Load upon the ship of each [creature] two mates and your family, except those about whom the word has preceded, and [include] whoever has believed." But none had believed with him, except a few.
trans-unit.target: [So zen], Gure komandoa etorri denean arte eta labean gainez, esan dugu "Load bakoitzak [izaki] bi lagunekin eta senideekin, badira behintzat ceinez hitzaren aurretik izan, eta ontziaren gainean [besteak] duenarentzat ditu

trans-unit.source: And [Noah] said, "Embark therein; in the name of Allah is its course and its anchorage. Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Eta [Noah] esan zuen, "Ekitea bertan;. Ala izenarekin bere ikastaro eta bere Ainguraketa da Izan ere, ene Jauna barkatzea eta Merciful da."

trans-unit.source: And it sailed with them through waves like mountains, and Noah called to his son who was apart [from them], "O my son, come aboard with us and be not with the disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: Eta sailen haiekin mendiak bezalako olatuak bidez, eta Noah bere semea izan zen aparte [haiengandik] deitu du, "O ene semea, etorriko itsasontzian gurekin eta ez izan disbelievers batera."

trans-unit.source: [But] he said, "I will take refuge on a mountain to protect me from the water." [Noah] said, "There is no protector today from the decree of Allah, except for whom He gives mercy." And the waves came between them, and he was among the drowned.
trans-unit.target: [Baina] esan zuen "aterpea hartuko dut mendi bat me babesteko uretatik."

trans-unit.source: And it was said, "O earth, swallow your water, and O sky, withhold [your rain]." And the water subsided, and the matter was accomplished, and the ship came to rest on the [mountain of] Judiyy. And it was said, "Away with the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: Eta esaten da, "O lurra, irentsi zure ura, eta O zeruan, atxikipena [zure euririk]."

trans-unit.source: And Noah called to his Lord and said, "My Lord, indeed my son is of my family; and indeed, Your promise is true; and You are the most just of judges!"
trans-unit.target: Eta Noah bere Jaunari dei egin eta esan zion: «Ene Jauna, hain zuzen ere, nire semea nire familia da, eta hain zuzen ere, Zure promesa egia da;! Eta dira gehien besterik epaileen duzu"

trans-unit.source: He said, "O Noah, indeed he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge. Indeed, I advise you, lest you be among the ignorant."
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "O Noah, hain zuzen ere, ez da zure familia;. Hain zuzen ere, [zeinen] lan leiala baino beste da, beraz, eskatu Me ez dagoela horri buruzko ezagutzarik ez duzu Izan ere, aholkatzen dut, kausituko

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from asking that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have mercy upon me, I will be among the losers."
trans-unit.target: [Noah] esan, "Nire Jauna, aterpea bilatzen dut You direla horietatik ezagutza ez daukat. Eta niri barkatzen eta erruki nitaz ez bazen, galtzaileen artean izango naiz eskatuz."

trans-unit.source: It was said, "O Noah, disembark in security from Us and blessings upon you and upon nations [descending] from those with you. But other nations [of them] We will grant enjoyment; then there will touch them from Us a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Esaten zuten, "O Noah, Us eta zure gainean bedeinkatzeko segurtasun eta nazioen [beheranzko] duzun dira eta haren lehorreratzen Baina beste nazio [haietako] gozamena emango dugu.; Orduan ez ukitzeko izango Us mingarria zigor bat

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, [O Muhammad]. You knew it not, neither you nor your people, before this. So be patient; indeed, the [best] outcome is for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Hori ikusezin albisteak eta horrek agerian nahi dugu, [O Muhammad] ra da.

trans-unit.source: And to 'Aad [We sent] their brother Hud. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. You are not but inventors [of falsehood].
trans-unit.target: Eta 'Aad bere anaia Hud [bidaliko dugu].

trans-unit.source: O my people, I do not ask you for it any reward. My reward is only from the one who created me. Then will you not reason?
