trans-unit.source: And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position and fears My threat."
trans-unit.target: Eta izango da ziur aski eragin dugu haiekin ondoren lur batean bizi zara.

trans-unit.source: And they requested victory from Allah, and disappointed, [therefore], was every obstinate tyrant.
trans-unit.target: Eta Allah garaipena eskatu dute, eta etsita, [beraz] tematia tirano guztietan izan zen.

trans-unit.source: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water.
trans-unit.target: Haren aurrean Hell da, eta zuen purulent ur edari bat emango zaie.

trans-unit.source: He will gulp it but will hardly [be able to] swallow it. And death will come to him from everywhere, but he is not to die. And before him is a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: it zurrutada izango zuen baina nekez [egon ahal izateko] irentsi.

trans-unit.source: The example of those who disbelieve in their Lord is [that] their deeds are like ashes which the wind blows forcefully on a stormy day; they are unable [to keep] from what they earned a [single] thing. That is what is extreme error.
trans-unit.target: beren Jaun inola ere sinesten dutenen adibidea da [hori] euren eskriturak errautsak bertan haize kolpeak indarrez egun ekaiztsu bat bezalakoak dira;

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen that Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth? If He wills, He can do away with you and produce a new creation.
trans-unit.target: Ez al duzu ikusten Ala zerua eta egia lurra sortu?

trans-unit.source: And that is not difficult for Allah.
trans-unit.target: Eta hori ez da Allah da zaila.

trans-unit.source: And they will come out [for judgement] before Allah all together, and the weak will say to those who were arrogant, "Indeed, we were your followers, so can you avail us anything against the punishment of Allah?" They will say, "If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you. It is all the same for us whether we show intolerance or are patient: there is for us no place of escape."
trans-unit.target: Eta etortzen dira izango out [epaia] Ala aurretik, guztiak elkarrekin, eta ahula egingo harroputz ciradeney erraiten, "Izan ere, zure jarraitzaile izan dugu, beraz, ezin digu Ala zigorra aurka ezer eskuratu duzu?"

trans-unit.source: And Satan will say when the matter has been concluded, "Indeed, Allah had promised you the promise of truth. And I promised you, but I betrayed you. But I had no authority over you except that I invited you, and you responded to me. So do not blame me; but blame yourselves. I cannot be called to your aid, nor can you be called to my aid. Indeed, I deny your association of me [with Allah] before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Eta Satan esango du arazo hau izan da ondorioztatu, "Izan ere, Ala izan hitzeman egia promesa. Eta agindu dut, baina zuk traizio dut. Baina autoridad ez nuen zuk baino gonbidatuta dudala ezik, eta erantzun behar duzu

trans-unit.source: And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein by permission of their Lord; and their greeting therein will be, "Peace!"
trans-unit.target: Eta nork uste zuen, eta leiala eskriturak Lorategi ingresatu izango dutenak eta horren azpian fluxua ibaietan, betiko bertan egoiten dela beren Jaunaren baimenik arabera;

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how Allah presents an example, [making] a good word like a good tree, whose root is firmly fixed and its branches [high] in the sky?
trans-unit.target: Jotzen ez duzu Ala adibide bat nola aurkezten, [Aldaratzea] zuhaitz on bat bezala hitz on bat, zeinen erro tinko finkoa da eta bere adar [handiko] zeruan?

trans-unit.source: It produces its fruit all the time, by permission of its Lord. And Allah presents examples for the people that perhaps they will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: bere fruituak denbora guztian ekoizten ditu, bere Jaunaren baimenik arabera.

trans-unit.source: And the example of a bad word is like a bad tree, uprooted from the surface of the earth, not having any stability.
trans-unit.target: Eta hitza txarra adibidea zuhaitza txarra, lurra, ez da inolako egonkortasuna izatea azalera deserrotzearen bezalakoa da.

trans-unit.source: Allah keeps firm those who believe, with the firm word, in worldly life and in the Hereafter. And Allah sends astray the wrongdoers. And Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Ala mantentzen sendoa dutenen ustez, enpresa hitzarekin, worldly bizitza eta aurrerantzean ere.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who exchanged the favor of Allah for disbelief and settled their people [in] the home of ruin?
trans-unit.target: Ez al duzu jotzen baitugu trukatu duten Ala sinesgaitza eta bere jendea bizitzera [en] ruina etxera horiek?

trans-unit.source: [It is] Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the settlement.
trans-unit.target: Hell, eta bertan izango dira [sartzeko] erre, [da] eta penagarria likidazioa da.

trans-unit.source: And they have attributed to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy yourselves, for indeed, your destination is the Fire."
trans-unit.target: Eta egozten dute, Ala berdin engainatuta [pertsona] Bere bide batetik.

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], tell My servants who have believed to establish prayer and spend from what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, before a Day comes in which there will be no exchange, nor any friendships.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad], esango, ordea, sinesten otoitz ezartzea eta zer eman dugu haiengandik pasatzeko, ezkutuka eta publikoki Nire funtzionario, Day bat dakar eta bertan trukea ez, ezta edozein adiskidetasuna izango da aurretik.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and sent down rain from the sky and produced thereby some fruits as provision for you and subjected for you the ships to sail through the sea by His command and subjected for you the rivers.
trans-unit.target: Ala zuretzat xedapen gisa zerua eta lurra sortu zuen eta zerutik euri bidalitako behera eta, ondorioz ekoiztutako fruta batzuk eta bere komando itsasoan zehar nabigatzen eta zuretzat jasaten ibaien zuretzat jasaten ontziak da.

trans-unit.source: And He subjected for you the sun and the moon, continuous [in orbit], and subjected for you the night and the day.
trans-unit.target: Eta jasaten zuen zuretzat eguzkia eta ilargia, etengabeko [orbitan], eta gaua eta eguna zuretzat jasaten.

trans-unit.source: And He gave you from all you asked of Him. And if you should count the favor of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, mankind is [generally] most unjust and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Eta zuk eman zuen beregan galdetu duzu guztietatik.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this city [Makkah] secure and keep me and my sons away from worshipping idols.
trans-unit.target: Eta [aipamena, O Muhammad], Abraham esan, "Nire Jauna, hiri hau [Makkah] segurua eta mantentzeko me eta nire semeak kanpoan idoloak gurtza.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, indeed they have led astray many among the people. So whoever follows me - then he is of me; and whoever disobeys me - indeed, You are [yet] Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Nire Jauna, hain zuzen ere astray pertsonen artean asko ekarri dute.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, I have settled some of my descendants in an uncultivated valley near Your sacred House, our Lord, that they may establish prayer. So make hearts among the people incline toward them and provide for them from the fruits that they might be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Gure Jauna, nire seme-alabetako batzuk finkatu ditut landu gabeko haran bat gertu Your House sakratua, gure Iaunean, otoitz hori ezarri ahal izango dute.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, indeed You know what we conceal and what we declare, and nothing is hidden from Allah on the earth or in the heaven.
trans-unit.target: Gure Jauna, hain zuzen ere, zer ezkutatzen dugun eta zer aldarrikatzen dugu ezagutzen duzu, eta ezer ez da Allah ezkutatuta lurrean, edo zeruan.

trans-unit.source: Praise to Allah, who has granted to me in old age Ishmael and Isaac. Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication.
trans-unit.target: Ala, nork du me emandako zahartzaroa Ismael eta Isaac Elogio.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
trans-unit.target: Nire Jauna, ni otoitz-establisher bat, eta [askotan] nire ondorengoei.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established."
trans-unit.target: Gure Jauna, barkatu ni eta nire gurasoak eta fededun Eguna kontu ezarri da. "

trans-unit.source: And never think that Allah is unaware of what the wrongdoers do. He only delays them for a Day when eyes will stare [in horror].
trans-unit.target: Eta inoiz uste Ala zer malhechores ez dakite.

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them, and their hearts are void.
trans-unit.target: Aurrera Racing, beren buruak resuscitatu, haien begirada ez du etorri itzuliko, eta beren bihotzak gabe gelditzen dira.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], warn the people of a Day when the punishment will come to them and those who did wrong will say, "Our Lord, delay us for a short term; we will answer Your call and follow the messengers." [But it will be said], "Had you not sworn, before, that for you there would be no cessation?
trans-unit.target: Eta, [O Muhammad], warn Eguna jendea denean zigorra izango haiek etorri eta nor gaizki egin dutenak, esan du, "Gure Jauna, atzeratuko digu epe labur batean;. Deia erantzun egingo dugu, eta mezulariak jarraitu"

trans-unit.source: And you lived among the dwellings of those who wronged themselves, and it had become clear to you how We dealt with them. And We presented for you [many] examples."
trans-unit.target: Eta nork bere burua link horiek etxebizitzen artean bizi izan duzu, eta hori izan den argi bihurtu da nola landu dugu haiekin.

trans-unit.source: And they had planned their plan, but with Allah is [recorded] their plan, even if their plan had been [sufficient] to do away with the mountains.
trans-unit.target: Eta bere plan aurreikusi zuten, baina Ala da [grabatu] bere plan, bere plan polita ari da, nahiz eta [nahikoa] mendietan ihes egin.

trans-unit.source: So never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, inoiz uste Allah egingo Bere Bere mezulariak promesa huts egiten.

trans-unit.source: [It will be] on the Day the earth will be replaced by another earth, and the heavens [as well], and all creatures will come out before Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: [Izanen da] Day lurraren ordeztu egingo dira beste lurrez, eta zeruan [bai], eta izaki guztiak etortzen dira Ala aurretik, Bat, indarrean du.

trans-unit.source: And you will see the criminals that Day bound together in shackles,
trans-unit.target: Eta gaizkile Day lotuak elkarrekin shackles ikusi ahal izango duzu,

trans-unit.source: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Haien zelaia likido jantziak eta beren aurpegiak Fire estalita.

trans-unit.source: So that Allah will recompense every soul for what it earned. Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, Ala zer da irabazi arima bakoitzak rendaturen.

trans-unit.source: This [Qur'an] is notification for the people that they may be warned thereby and that they may know that He is but one God and that those of understanding will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Hau [Qur'an] jendea jakinarazpena dutela horrela ohartarazi ahal izango du eta jakin ahal izango dute, hau da He Jainko bat baizik eta adimenaren horiek gogorarazi egingo da.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Ra.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
trans-unit.target: Agian sinesten dutenek izan dute musulmanek nahi dizu.

trans-unit.source: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Demagun horiek jan eta primeran pasatzen dute eta [faltsua] itxaropena desbideratzen, ari dira ezagutzen joan.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez du axola hiria suntsitu baina ez da hori ezagutzen dekretu bat izan zen.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
trans-unit.target: Ez dago nazioa bere epe aurretik egingo, ezta izango hortik aurrera jarraituko dute.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
trans-unit.target: Eta, esan dute "O nori haren mezua behera bidalia izan da, hain zuzen ere, zara ero.

trans-unit.source: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Zergatik ez duzu ekarri digu aingeruak, zuk egiazkoa artean izan behar badu? "

trans-unit.source: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Ez dugu bidali behera aingeruak egia bazen;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, dugu da nork bidali behera Qur'an eta hain zuzen ere, bere tutorea izango dugu.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Eta genuen zalantzarik [mezulariak] igorri aurretik, [O Muhammad], antzinako herrien sekta artean.

trans-unit.source: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
trans-unit.target: Eta mezularia ez litzateke horiek etorriko zion barregarri dutela ezik.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Horrela ez ukatzea txertatu dugu gaizkile bihotzetan sartu.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Ez dute sinesten, ez du dagoeneko gertatu da antzinako herrien aurrekaria.

trans-unit.source: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
trans-unit.target: Eta [are] ireki genuen beraiekin bada zerutik ate bat eta bertan igotzeko jarraitu dute,

trans-unit.source: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Esaten dute litzateke, "Gure begiak bakarrik liluratu dira. Izan ere, kaltetutako magiaz pertsona bat gara."

trans-unit.source: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
trans-unit.target: Eta ditugu zeruan izar handi barruan kokatu dute eta edertu dute begirale da.

trans-unit.source: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
trans-unit.target: Eta babestuta egin dugu, kanporatu [Ala erruki] deabruari guztietatik

trans-unit.source: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
trans-unit.target: bat duten audientzia lapurtu eta ez dago argi erretzen bat lortu nahi izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
trans-unit.target: Eta lurra - zabaldu dugu izan da eta bertan tinko ezarri mendiak bota eta eragindako bertan [zerbait] gauza orekatua guztietan hazten.

trans-unit.source: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
trans-unit.target: Eta egin ditugu for you bertan bizi eta [da] horiek norentzat ez zara hornitzaileak esan.

trans-unit.source: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez da gauza bat, baina gurekin bere Gordailuko dira, eta ez dugu bidaliko behera ezagutzen neurri baten arabera izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
trans-unit.target: Eta fertilizing haizeek bidaliko dugu, eta ura bidaltzen behera zerutik eta emandako edan bertatik duzu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, dugu, bizitza eta heriotza kausa eman duten da, eta oinordeko gara.

trans-unit.source: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
trans-unit.target: Eta jadanik ezagutzen dugu, aurreko [belaunaldien] artean, eta dagoeneko geroago [direnak etortzen] ezagutzen dugu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, zure Jaun bilduko ditu;

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez zalantzarik sortzen dugu gizon buztin aldaturiko lokatz beltza batetik.

trans-unit.source: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
trans-unit.target: Eta jinn aurretik sortu dugu eguzkitsua benetan sua.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: Eta [aipamena, O Muhammad], zure Jaunaren aingeruak esan zion, "giza buztin kanpo egotea aldaturiko lokatz beltza bat sortuko dut.

trans-unit.source: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz proportziozko dut eta berarekin sartu arnasten My [sortu] soul, orduan erori zion prostration ere. "

trans-unit.source: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
trans-unit.target: Beraz Aingueruén ahuspez - horiek guztiak oso-osorik,

trans-unit.source: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
trans-unit.target: Iblees ezik, nahi duten prostrated horiek izan ukatu zuen.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
trans-unit.target: [Ala] esan, O Iblees, zer da [Gaia] zurekin ez diren belaunikatu dutenek duzu? "

trans-unit.source: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Inoiz ez litzateke belaunikatu giza a nori sortu duzu buztin aldaturiko lokatz beltza batetik joan nintzen."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
trans-unit.target: [Ala] esan zuen, "Gero hortik atera, hain zuzen ere, kanporatu duzu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, zure gainean recompense eguna arte madarikazioa da. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Nire Jauna, ondoren, amnistia me Day berpiztu dira arte."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
trans-unit.target: [Ala] esan, "Beraz, hain zuzen ere, dira reprieved horietako duzu

trans-unit.source: Until the Day of the time well-known."
trans-unit.target: garai ezagun egunera arte. "

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] esan, "Nire Jauna, jarri delako me error in, I ziur egin beharko [desobedientzia] erakargarria horiek lurrean, eta horiek guztiak engainatuta egingo dut

trans-unit.source: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
trans-unit.target: Ezik, horien artean, zure zerbitzariek aukeratu. "

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
trans-unit.target: [Ala] esan zuen, "bide bat [itzulera-] Me to [dela] zuzen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, nire zerbitzariei - autoridad ez izango dute, haien gainean duzu, jarraitzen duten deviators salbu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, Hell horiek guztiak leku agindutako da.

trans-unit.source: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
trans-unit.target: zazpi ate ditu;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, leiala izango lorategi eta iturburuak barruan egon.

trans-unit.source: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
trans-unit.target: [Balitz esan], "Sar ezazu bakea, seguru [eta ziurtatzeko]."

trans-unit.source: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
trans-unit.target: Eta edozein dela haien erresumina bularrak da ezabatuko ditugu, [so izango dute] anaiak, tronuak elkarri begira on.

trans-unit.source: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
trans-unit.target: Ez neke horiek ukitu du bertan, ezta izango dute [inoiz] kendu egingo da bertatik.

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad], informatzeko Nire funtzionario naizela nor barkatzea da, Merciful da.

trans-unit.source: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Eta hori My zigorra bertan mingarria zigorra da.

trans-unit.source: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
trans-unit.target: Eta horiek Abraham gonbidatuak buruz,

trans-unit.source: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."
trans-unit.target: Noiz sartu zen haren gainean zuten, esanez: «Bakea."

trans-unit.source: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
trans-unit.target: [Aingeruak] esan zuen, "Beldurra ez. Izan ere, ikasi mutiko bat euangelizatzen ematen dugu."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Izan me berri ona eman duzu zahartzarora egin didan etorri arren? Eta zer [harritzekoa] ez informatzeko of?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
trans-unit.target: Esan zuten, "ematen dizugu egian euangelizatzen, beraz, ez etsituta du izan."

trans-unit.source: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Eta nork bere Jaunaren erruki of itxaropenik horiek astray ezik?"

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] esan zuen, "Orduan, zer da zure negozioa [hemen], O mezulariak da?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
trans-unit.target: Esan zuten, «Izan ere, gaizkile pertsona bat izan dugu bidali da,

trans-unit.source: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
trans-unit.target: Lot familia izan ezik;

trans-unit.source: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
trans-unit.target: bere emaztea izan ezik. "Ala dekretatu atzean geratzen dutenen da.

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz mezulariak Lot familia etorri zen,

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Izan ere, ez zara pertsona ezezagunak."

trans-unit.source: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
trans-unit.target: Esan zuten, «Baina ditugun zaudela horrek buruz eztabaidan ari ziren batera,

trans-unit.source: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
trans-unit.target: Eta zuk etorri gara egiarekin, eta hain zuzen ere, egiazkoa gara.

trans-unit.source: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ezarri zure familiarekin gauaren zati batean zehar, euren atzetik jarraitu eta utzi ez inori atzera begiratu duzu eta jarraitu non agindu nahi beste. "

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.
trans-unit.target: Eta transmititu zion [dekretua] materia hori behar dugu: horiek [bekatorén] goizean goiz kanporatua izango litzateke.

trans-unit.source: And the people of the city came rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: Eta hiriko jendea etorri zen alegueraric.

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
trans-unit.target: [Lot] esan zuen, "Izan ere, horiek nire gonbidatuak dira, beraz, ez lotsa.

trans-unit.source: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
trans-unit.target: Eta beldurra Allah eta ez lotsagarri me. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
trans-unit.target: Esan zuten, «ez dugu debekatuta duzu [babesteko] people from?"

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
trans-unit.target: [Lot] esan zuen, "Hauek dira nire alabak -. Duzun akusaziopean [sori ezkontzaren] izango litzateke"

trans-unit.source: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: zure bizitza, [O Muhammad] By, hain zuzen ere egongo ziren, beren intoxikatzaileak, blindly dabiltzan.

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Beraz garrasi konfiskatu horiek sunrise at.

trans-unit.source: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.
trans-unit.target: Eta parte handienak [hiriko] bere txikiena egin dugu eta horien gainean euria egin buztin gogorra harriak.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere horretan bereizten dutenentzat seinaleak dira.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, hiri horiek [kokatua] ezarritako errepide baten gainean daude.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
trans-unit.target: Hain zuzen ere hori fededun dagoen seinale da.

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Eta arboladian laguntzaile [ere] malhechores ziren.

trans-unit.source: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
trans-unit.target: Beraz ordainsari hartu dugu haiengandik, eta hain zuzen ere, bi [hiri] autopista argi bat dira.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Eta, zalantzarik gabe, zuen Thamud laguntzaileak ukatzeko mandatarien.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
trans-unit.target: Eta horien Gure seinaleak eman dugu, baina haiengandik ziren kanpoan inflexio dute.

trans-unit.source: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
trans-unit.target: Eta mendiak, etxeak, seguruak sentitzeko zatitzeko erabiltzen dute.

trans-unit.source: But the shriek seized them at early morning.
trans-unit.target: Baina garrasi konfiskatu horiek goizean goiz.

trans-unit.source: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ez da ezer availed horiek [from] zer den irabazteko erabiltzen dute.

trans-unit.source: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez dugu zerua eta lurra sortu eta haien artean dagoela egia izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, zure Jaun - jakiteak sortzailea da.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Eta, zalantzarik gabe, ematen dizugu, [O Muhammad], askotan errepikatzen [bertsoak] zazpi eta Qur'an handia.

trans-unit.source: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers
trans-unit.target: Ez luzatu your eyes horren bidez gozamena eman diogu [jakin] disbelievers de kategoriak duten norabidean, eta ez haiek baino grieve.

trans-unit.source: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
trans-unit.target: Eta esan, "Izan ere, naiz argi Warner" -

trans-unit.source: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
trans-unit.target: Dugu agerian zutenez [Eskrituretako] banatzaile izateko

trans-unit.source: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.
trans-unit.target: Nor Qur'an egin dute zatitan banatuz.

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
trans-unit.target: Beraz, zure Jaun arabera, izango da ziur aski zalantzan dugu denak

trans-unit.source: About what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: zer egin erabiltzen dute buruz.

trans-unit.source: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren deklaratzeko zer agindu duzu eta piztu polytheists metrora.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, nahikoa gara duzu Imitatzaileak aurka

trans-unit.source: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Nork egin [berdinak] Ala beste jainko.

trans-unit.source: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.
trans-unit.target: Eta ezagutzen dugu dagoeneko zure bularreko hori zer esaten zuen egitekoa.

trans-unit.source: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
trans-unit.target: Beraz, goraturen [Ala] zure Jaunaren laudorio eta [Harekin] belaunikatu dutenen izan.

trans-unit.source: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
trans-unit.target: Eta gurtzen Jauna ez duzu dator ziurtasun (heriotza) arte.

trans-unit.source: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Ala komando Datozen da, beraz, ez da pazientziarik.

trans-unit.source: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, [telling them], "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: behera bidaltzen zuen aingeruak, bere komando inspirazioa, eta harekin haren borondateak zuen bere zerbitzarien, [kontatzeko], batera "Abisatu ez dagoela jainko ez Me izan ezik; beraz beldur Me."

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: zerua eta lurra egia sortu zuen.

trans-unit.source: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary.
trans-unit.target: man sortu zuen espermatozoide-tanta batetik;

trans-unit.source: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: Eta belarjaleak du He zuretzat sortu du;

trans-unit.source: And for you in them is [the enjoyment of] beauty when you bring them in [for the evening] and when you send them out [to pasture].
trans-unit.target: Eta zuretzat horietan dagoen edertasun denean horiek ekarri [arratsaldean], eta horiek bidali dezakezu [larre] [gozamena].

trans-unit.source: And they carry your loads to a land you could not have reached except with difficulty to yourselves. Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Eta zure zamak eraman zuten lur bat ezin duzu iritsi zuek zailtasun dituzten ezik.

trans-unit.source: And [He created] the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and [as] adornment. And He creates that which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Eta [sortu zuen], zaldi, mando eta asto zuretzat ibiltzeko eta [jo] Apaingarririk.

trans-unit.source: And upon Allah is the direction of the [right] way, and among the various paths are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala haren [eskubidea] modu norabidea da, eta hainbat bide artean dira desbideratzen dutenak.

trans-unit.source: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage in which you pasture [animals].
trans-unit.target: Nork bidaltzen behera euri zerutik He da;

trans-unit.source: He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: zuretzat hazten horrela, laboreak, oliba, palmondoak, bazegoela, eta bertatik fruituak guztiak eragiten zuen.

trans-unit.source: And He has subjected for you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: Eta zuretzat ditu jasaten gau eta egun eta eguzkia eta ilargia eta izarrak dira bere aginduak jasaten.

trans-unit.source: And [He has subjected] whatever He multiplied for you on the earth of varying colors. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who remember.
trans-unit.target: Eta [He jasaten ditu] whatever biderkatuko zuretzat He kolore desberdineko lurraren gainean.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who subjected the sea for you to eat from it tender meat and to extract from it ornaments which you wear. And you see the ships plowing through it, and [He subjected it] that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Eta zuen itsasoaren jasaten duten zuretzat lizitazio haragia jaten zuen eta zein jantziko duzu apaingarriak ateratzea da.

trans-unit.source: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and [made] rivers and roads, that you may be guided,
trans-unit.target: Eta lurra tinko ezarri mendiak, beldurrez filmea zurekin sartu zuen bota du, eta [egin] ibaiak eta errepideak, duzula gidatu dezake,

trans-unit.source: And landmarks. And by the stars they are [also] guided.
trans-unit.target: Eta mugarriak.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Orduan da nor bat ez duen sortu bezala sortzen?

trans-unit.source: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala mesederik zenbatu behar duzu bada, ezin duzu aipa itzazu.

trans-unit.source: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare.
trans-unit.target: Eta Allah daki zer ezkutatzen duzu, eta zer aldarrikatu duzu.

trans-unit.source: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they [themselves] are created.
trans-unit.target: Eta horiek beste Allah baino ezer sortu deitu dute, eta [bere burua] egilea.

trans-unit.source: They are, [in fact], dead, not alive, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: dira, [Izan ere], hilik, ez bizirik, eta ez dute hautematen denean berpiztu egingo dute.

trans-unit.source: Your god is one God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter - their hearts are disapproving, and they are arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Zure jainkoa Jainko bat da.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Zinez Ala daki zer ezkutatzen duten eta zer aldarrikatu dute.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples,"
trans-unit.target: Eta horiek behar da, esan du, "Zein da zure Lord bidaliko behera?"

trans-unit.source: That they may bear their own burdens in full on the Day of Resurrection and some of the burdens of those whom they misguide without knowledge. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear.
trans-unit.target: Hori da haien osorik kargak egin izan baitezakete Piztuera Eguna eta nori misguide zuten jakin gabe horien kargak batzuk.

trans-unit.source: Those before them had already plotted, but Allah came at their building from the foundations, so the roof fell upon them from above them, and the punishment came to them from where they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: haien aurretik dutenek dagoeneko azpilana egin zuen, baina Allah bere eraikinaren zimenduak batetik etorri zen, teilatua beren gañera erori da, beraz, haien gainean, eta zigorra etorri zitzaien non ez zuten hauteman.

trans-unit.source: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will disgrace them and say, "Where are My 'partners' for whom you used to oppose [the believers]?" Those who were given knowledge will say, "Indeed disgrace, this Day, and evil are upon the disbelievers" -
trans-unit.target: Ondoren Resurrección zuen egunean horiek ezbeharren eta esan, "Non daude nire 'bazkideen norentzat aurka jartzeko [fededun] erabiltzen duzu?"

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death [while] wronging themselves, and [who] then offer submission, [saying], "We were not doing any evil." But, yes! Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Direnak nori aingeruak heriotza ere hartu [bitartean] beraiek wronging, eta [duten] ondoren eskaintzen aurkezteko, [esaten], "Ez genuen inolako gaiztakeria."

trans-unit.source: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, sartu infernuko ateak betiko bertan egoitera, eta nola penagarria harroputz egoitza da.

trans-unit.source: And it will be said to those who feared Allah, "What did your Lord send down?" They will say, "[That which is] good." For those who do good in this world is good; and the home of the Hereafter is better. And how excellent is the home of the righteous -
trans-unit.target: Eta duten beldur Allah, horiek egingo esan "Zer egin bidaltzeko zure Lord behera?"

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence, which they will enter, beneath which rivers flow. They will have therein whatever they wish. Thus does Allah reward the righteous -
trans-unit.target: betiereko egoitza, eta bertan sartuko dute, eta horren azpian fluxua ibaietan lorategiak.

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death, [being] good and pure; [the angels] will say, "Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: direnak nori aingeruak heriotza ere hartu du, [izateaz] ona eta purua;

trans-unit.source: Do the disbelievers await [anything] except that the angels should come to them or there comes the command of your Lord? Thus did those do before them. And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Ez disbelievers zain [ezer] aingeruak haiek etorri beharko ezik edo ez komandoa dator zure Jaunaren?

trans-unit.source: So they were struck by the evil consequences of what they did and were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Haiek ziren zer egin ziren eta haiek zer erabili irrigarri dute inguratzen dituen ondorio gaiztoak jo.

trans-unit.source: And those who associate others with Allah say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have worshipped anything other than Him, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden anything through other than Him." Thus did those do before them. So is there upon the messengers except [the duty of] clear notification?
trans-unit.target: Eta erlazionatuko duten beste batzuk Allah dutenek diotenez, "Allah willed izan bada, ez genuke gurtzen dute ezer Bera baino beste, ez genuke ezta gure gurasoak, ezta ezer beste bitartez Bera baino debekatu egin dugu."

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent into every nation a messenger, [saying], "Worship Allah and avoid Taghut." And among them were those whom Allah guided, and among them were those upon whom error was [deservedly] decreed. So proceed through the earth and observe how was the end of the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Eta, zalantzarik gabe, mezulari bat, [esaten] nazio guztietan sartu bidaliko dugu, "Kultu Allah eta Taghut saihesteko."

trans-unit.source: [Even] if you should strive for their guidance, [O Muhammad], indeed, Allah does not guide those He sends astray, and they will have no helpers.
trans-unit.target: [Nahiz] Haren gidaritzapean ahaleginak egin behar bada, [O Muhammad], hain zuzen ere, Ala ez du gidatuko horiek astray bidaltzen zuen, eta laguntzaileak ez dute izango.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths [that] Allah will not resurrect one who dies. But yes - [it is] a true promise [binding] upon Him, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Eta zin Ala by dute beren zin indartsuena [duten] Ala ez berpizteko bat hildako.

trans-unit.source: [It is] so He will make clear to them [the truth of] that wherein they differ and so those who have disbelieved may know that they were liars.
trans-unit.target: [Da] beraz, horiek [egiaren] dela argi utzi zuen egingo dua bereizten dira eta, beraz, nor izan disbelieved horiek ezagutu ahal izango zirela liars.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Our word to a thing when We intend it is but that We say to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Gure Gauza bat hitza denean gure asmoa da, baina hori esatea da nahi dugu, "Kontuz," eta hori da.

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for [the cause of] Allah after they had been wronged - We will surely settle them in this world in a good place; but the reward of the Hereafter is greater, if only they could know.
trans-unit.target: Eta nor da Allah [kausa] emigratu zuten tratatua izan ondoren horiek - ziur aski izango dugu konformatu horiek leku ona mundu honetan;

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who endured patiently and upon their Lord relied.
trans-unit.target: [Dira] nork jasan pazientziaz beren Lord bermea dutenak eta haren.

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you except men to whom We revealed [Our message]. So ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez bidali dugu duzu lehenago gizonak nori reuelatu dugu [Gure mezua] ezik.

trans-unit.source: [We sent them] with clear proofs and written ordinances. And We revealed to you the message that you may make clear to the people what was sent down to them and that they might give thought.
trans-unit.target: [Igor dugu] froga argi eta idatzizko ordenantzak batera.

trans-unit.source: Then, do those who have planned evil deeds feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them or that the punishment will not come upon them from where they do not perceive?
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, egin izan duten ekintza gaiztoak aurreikusi horiek sentitzen ziurtatzeko Ala izango ez duten eragin lurra irentsi edo zigorra ez dela hetara heldu non ez dute hautematen from?

trans-unit.source: Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure?
trans-unit.target: Edo hori ez zien aprobetxa bere [ohiko] Jarduera zehar, eta ezin izan zuten hutsegitea eragin?

trans-unit.source: Or that He would not seize them gradually [in a state of dread]? But indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Edo hori ez zuen aprobetxa itzazu pixkanaka [izu-egoera batean]?

trans-unit.source: Have they not considered what things Allah has created? Their shadows incline to the right and to the left, prostrating to Allah, while they are humble.
trans-unit.target: Izan ez jotzen dute zer gauza Ala sortu du?

trans-unit.source: And to Allah prostrates whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth of creatures, and the angels [as well], and they are not arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Eta Allah ahozpez edozein dela zeruan dago eta edozein dela izaki lurra, eta aingeruak [bai] on da, eta ez dira harroputz.

trans-unit.source: They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
trans-unit.target: beren Jaunaren beldur dira haien gainean, eta zer agindu egiten dute.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has said, "Do not take for yourselves two deities. He is but one God, so fear only Me."
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala esan du, "Ez ceuroc bi jainko jartzean. Da baina Jainkoa bat zuen, beraz, beldurra bakarrik Me."

trans-unit.source: And to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him is [due] worship constantly. Then is it other than Allah that you fear?
trans-unit.target: Eta zion dagokio edozein dela zerua eta lurra da, eta beregan [direlako] gurtza da etengabe.

trans-unit.source: And whatever you have of favor - it is from Allah. Then when adversity touches you, to Him you cry for help.
trans-unit.target: Eta edozein ederraren duzu - Allah da.

trans-unit.source: Then when He removes the adversity from you, at once a party of you associates others with their Lord
trans-unit.target: Orduan, zuk zoritxarrean, aldi berean zuk festa bat elkartutako beste batzuk beren Lord batera kentzen zuen

trans-unit.source: So they will deny what We have given them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, zer eman dugu ukatu egingo dute.

trans-unit.source: And they assign to what they do not know a portion of that which We have provided them. By Allah, you will surely be questioned about what you used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Eta esleitu zer ez dakite zein eman ditugu horren zati da momentu honetan.

trans-unit.source: And they attribute to Allah daughters - exalted is He - and for them is what they desire.
trans-unit.target: Eta aitortu Ala alabak dira - goraturen da - eta beraientzat da, zer nahi dute.

trans-unit.source: And when one of them is informed of [the birth of] a female, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.
trans-unit.target: Eta horietako bat da emakume bat [jaiotza] informatuta, bere aurpegia ilun bihurtzen da, eta mina arbuiatzen zuen.

trans-unit.source: He hides himself from the people because of the ill of which he has been informed. Should he keep it in humiliation or bury it in the ground? Unquestionably, evil is what they decide.
trans-unit.target: berak ezkutatzen zuen haren berri izan informatuta pertsonen gaixotu direla eta.

trans-unit.source: For those who do not believe in the Hereafter is the description of evil; and for Allah is the highest attribute. And He is Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: ez duten aurrerantzean sinesten dutenentzat gaiztoak deskribapena da;

trans-unit.source: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for their wrongdoing, He would not have left upon the earth any creature, but He defers them for a specified term. And when their term has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it].
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala errua inposatzeko bere wrongdoing jendeak balitz, Zuen ez lurraren gainean geratzen edozein izaki, baina horiek defers zuen epe jakin batez.

trans-unit.source: And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike, and their tongues assert the lie that they will have the best [from Him]. Assuredly, they will have the Fire, and they will be [therein] neglected.
trans-unit.target: Eta omen Ala hori dute dislike, eta beren hizkuntzak aldarrikatzeko gezur hori izango da onena [Bera] dute.

trans-unit.source: By Allah, We did certainly send [messengers] to nations before you, but Satan made their deeds attractive to them. And he is the disbelievers' ally today [as well], and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ala, ez zuen zalantzarik, bidali dugu [mezulariak] nazio duzu aurretik, baina Satan egin haien egintza horietako erakargarria.

trans-unit.source: And We have not revealed to you the Book, [O Muhammad], except for you to make clear to them that wherein they have differed and as guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez dugu izan duzu agerian Book, [O Muhammad], horiek argi egin dezakezu dua desberdina izango dute eta orientazio eta erruki bezala uste duten pertsona bat izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has sent down rain from the sky and given life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who listen.
trans-unit.target: Eta Allah bidali du behera zerutik euria eta emandako bizitza horrela lurrari bere rria ondoren.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in grazing livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from what is in their bellies - between excretion and blood - pure milk, palatable to drinkers.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, zuretzat ere abeltzaintza artzaintza ikasgai bat da.

trans-unit.source: And from the fruits of the palm trees and grapevines you take intoxicant and good provision. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: Eta palmondoak eta bazegoela fruituak batetik intoxicant eta ona xedapen hartuko duzu.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and [in] that which they construct.
trans-unit.target: Eta zure Lord erlea inspiratu, "zuk zeuk hartu du mendiak, etxeak artean, eta zuhaitzen artean eta [in] hori zuten eraikitzen.

trans-unit.source: Then eat from all the fruits and follow the ways of your Lord laid down [for you]." There emerges from their bellies a drink, varying in colors, in which there is healing for people. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, fruituak jan eta zure Jaunaren bideak jarraitu ezarritako [zuretzat]. "Edari bat beren sabelak batetik Han sortzen da, kolore desberdinak, eta bertan ez da jendea sendatzeko da. Izan ere hori pertsona baten seinale da

trans-unit.source: And Allah created you; then He will take you in death. And among you is he who is reversed to the most decrepit [old] age so that he will not know, after [having had] knowledge, a thing. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Competent.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala sortu duzu;

trans-unit.source: And Allah has favored some of you over others in provision. But those who were favored would not hand over their provision to those whom their right hands possess so they would be equal to them therein. Then is it the favor of Allah they reject?
trans-unit.target: Ala eta zuetako batzuk ekarri du xedapen ere besteen gainetik.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you from yourselves mates and has made for you from your mates sons and grandchildren and has provided for you from the good things. Then in falsehood do they believe and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala zuretzat ceuroc lagunak eta du zuretzat zure lagunak semeak eta bilobak eta du zuretzat emandako gauza onak from.

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that which does not possess for them [the power of] provision from the heavens and the earth at all, and [in fact], they are unable.
trans-unit.target: Eta gurtzen Allah gain dute eta horrek ez du beraientzat jabe zerutik xedapen eta lurra [boterea] guztietan, eta [Izan ere], ezin dira erabiltzen.

trans-unit.source: So do not assert similarities to Allah. Indeed, Allah knows and you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ez antzekotasunak aldarrikatzeko Ala.

trans-unit.source: Allah presents an example: a slave [who is] owned and unable to do a thing and he to whom We have provided from Us good provision, so he spends from it secretly and publicly. Can they be equal? Praise to Allah! But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ala adibide bat aurkezten du: esklabo bat [nor da] jabetzako eta ezin gauza bat eta nori batetik Us xedapen ona dugu eskaini nahi du, beraz, gastatzen zuen ezkutuka eta publikoki.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example of two men, one of them dumb and unable to do a thing, while he is a burden to his guardian. Wherever he directs him, he brings no good. Is he equal to one who commands justice, while he is on a straight path?
trans-unit.target: Ala eta bi gizon, horietako bat muda eta ezin gauza bat egin adibide bat aurkezten du, bere tutore den zama bat da zuen bitartean.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And the command for the Hour is not but as a glance of the eye or even nearer. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala ikusezin [alderdiak] zerua eta lurraren jabea da.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and intellect that perhaps you would be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Eta Allah erauzi ditu zure amen wombs batetik, ez gauza bat jakitea, eta egin zituen duzun entzumena eta ikusmena eta adimena agian hori eskertzekoa litzateke zuretzat.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky? None holds them up except Allah. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Ez dute ez ikusi zerua giroa kontrolatzen hegaztiak?

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you from your homes a place of rest and made for you from the hides of the animals tents which you find light on your day of travel and your day of encampment; and from their wool, fur and hair is furnishing and enjoyment for a time.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala atseden lekua eta zuretzat zure etxetik bertan argi Zure bidaia eguna eta kanpamentura egunean aurkituko duzu animaliak karpa ezkutatzen batetik zuretzat;

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you, from that which He has created, shadows and has made for you from the mountains, shelters and has made for you garments which protect you from the heat and garments which protect you from your [enemy in] battle. Thus does He complete His favor upon you that you might submit [to Him].
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala hori bertatik sortu ditu, itzalak eta du egin, mendi, aterpetxe ditu eta bertan babestu duzu beroa eta horrek babestu zure bataila [etsai] jantziak batetik jantziak egin zuretzat,.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad] - then only upon you is [responsibility for] clear notification.
trans-unit.target: Baina piztu dute kanpoan bada, [O Muhammad] - orduan bakarrik zure gainean jakinarazpen argi [erantzukizuna] da.

trans-unit.source: They recognize the favor of Allah; then they deny it. And most of them are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Ala aldeko ezagutzen dituzte;

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect from every nation a witness. Then it will not be permitted to the disbelievers [to apologize or make excuses], nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
trans-unit.target: Eta [aipamen] Eguna noiz egingo diren nazio guztietatik berpizteko dugu lekukoa.

trans-unit.source: And when those who wronged see the punishment, it will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz nork link ikusi zigorra horiek, ez da, beraientzat arindua, ezta izango reprieved izango dute.

trans-unit.source: And when those who associated others with Allah see their "partners," they will say," Our Lord, these are our partners [to You] whom we used to invoke besides You." But they will throw at them the statement, "Indeed, you are liars."
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz lotutako beste batzuk Ala horiek ikusi bere "bazkide", esan dute, "Gure Jauna, horiek gure bazkideak [zaude] nori duzu gainera aldarrika erabiltzen dugu."

trans-unit.source: And they will impart to Allah that Day [their] submission, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala egingo dute ematen duten Day [bere] aurkezteko, eta haiengandik galdu da zer den asmatzeko erabiltzen dute.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved and averted [others] from the way of Allah - We will increase them in punishment over [their] punishment for what corruption they were causing.
trans-unit.target: horiek handitu egingo dugu zigorraren [bere] zer ustelkeria eragiten ari zirela zigorra baino - nor disbelieved eta Averted [besteek] Ala bidea dutenek.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect among every nation a witness over them from themselves. And We will bring you, [O Muhammad], as a witness over your nation. And We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims.
trans-unit.target: Eta [aipamen] Eguna noiz egingo diren nazio guztietatik artean berpizteko dugu haien gainean lekuko baten eskutik.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Allah aginduak justizia eta jokabide ona eta senide emanez eta debekatzen immorality eta jokabide txarra eta zapalkuntza.

trans-unit.source: And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, [O believers], and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness. Indeed, Allah knows what you do.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala itun betetzen denean hartu duzu izan da, [O fededun], eta ez zinak hautsi bere berrespena ondoren egin dituzun bitartean Ala, baino gehiago, lekukoa.

trans-unit.source: And do not be like she who untwisted her spun thread after it was strong [by] taking your oaths as [means of] deceit between you because one community is more plentiful [in number or wealth] than another community. Allah only tries you thereby. And He will surely make clear to you on the Day of Resurrection that over which you used to differ.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez zuen atsegin izan duten untwisted bere hilaren haria sendoa zen ondoren zure zin hartzen duzun bitartean enganio [bitartez] argitalpenek ere ugaria beste komunitate baino [zenbakia edo aberastasuna] delako [eta].

trans-unit.source: And if Allah had willed, He could have made you [of] one religion, but He causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And you will surely be questioned about what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala willed izan bada, zuen egin ahal izan duzu [de] erlijio bat, baina harekin borondateak eta gidak nori zuen borondateak He kaleko eragiten zuen.

trans-unit.source: And do not take your oaths as [means of] deceit between you, lest a foot slip after it was [once] firm, and you would taste evil [in this world] for what [people] you diverted from the way of Allah, and you would have [in the Hereafter] a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez zure zin hartu enganio duzun bitartean [bitartez] bezala, oinez lapsus bat kausituko izan ondoren [behin] irmoa, eta gaiztoak dastatu nahi duzun [mundu honetan] zer [pertsona] desbideratzen Ala bide batetik zuretzat,

trans-unit.source: And do not exchange the covenant of Allah for a small price. Indeed, what is with Allah is best for you, if only you could know.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez Ala itun trukatzeko prezio txiki bat da.

trans-unit.source: Whatever you have will end, but what Allah has is lasting. And We will surely give those who were patient their reward according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Whatever azkenean izango duzu, baina zer Allah du da iraunkorra.

trans-unit.source: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life, and We will surely give them their reward [in the Hereafter] according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Duenak ez iustitiari, gizon edo emakume ala ez, sinestuna da zuen bitartean - We izango da ziur aski eragin zion bizitza ona bizi nahi, eta ziur aski emango dugu haiek beren saria [aurrerantzean] zer egin erabiltzen dute onenen arabera.

trans-unit.source: So when you recite the Qur'an, [first] seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled [from His mercy].
trans-unit.target: Beraz, Qur'an errezitatuko duzu, [lehen] aterpea bilatzen Ala Satan, kanporatu [Bere erruki from].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, there is for him no authority over those who have believed and rely upon their Lord.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, ez, ordea, sinesten eta beren Jaun haren konfiantza horiek eskumena ez berarentzat da.

trans-unit.source: His authority is only over those who take him as an ally and those who through him associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Bere autoritate bakarra aliatu gisa hartu zion direnen eta besteen bidez lotzeko Ala zion horiek baino gehiago da.

trans-unit.source: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, [O Muhammad], are but an inventor [of lies]." But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz bertso bat ordezkatuko dugu bertso baten tokian - eta Ala da gehien zer behera bidaltzen zuen ezagutzaile -, esan dute "You, [O Muhammad], dira baina asmatzaile [gezurraren] bat."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "The Pure Spirit has brought it down from your Lord in truth to make firm those who believe and as guidance and good tidings to the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Esan, [O Muhammad], "Pure Spirit ekarri behera zure Jauna egia sinesten duten eta sendoa horiek egiteko orientazioa eta euangelizatzen musulmanen bezala."

trans-unit.source: And We certainly know that they say, "It is only a human being who teaches the Prophet." The tongue of the one they refer to is foreign, and this Qur'an is [in] a clear Arabic language.
trans-unit.target: Eta jakin dugu zalantzarik, esan dute "gizaki bat bakarrik Profeta irakasten da."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not believe in the verses of Allah - Allah will not guide them, and for them is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, ez duten Ala bertsoak sinesten - Ala ez da izango haiek gidatzeko, eta haientzat zigor mingarria da.

trans-unit.source: They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah, and it is those who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: bakarrik asmatu dute faltsutasuna ez duten Ala bertsoak sinesten, eta dutenentzat liars dira da.

trans-unit.source: Whoever disbelieves in Allah after his belief... except for one who is forced [to renounce his religion] while his heart is secure in faith. But those who [willingly] open their breasts to disbelief, upon them is wrath from Allah, and for them is a great punishment;
trans-unit.target: Denbora Ala ere disbelieves bere sinesmena ondoren ... bat nor da behartu [bere erlijioa uko egitera] bere bihotza fedean segurua da bitartean izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: That is because they preferred the worldly life over the Hereafter and that Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.
trans-unit.target: Hori da aurrerantzean baino gehiago worldly bizitza hobetsia dutelako eta hori Ala ez du sinesgarritasuna pertsonek gidatzeko.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones over whose hearts and hearing and vision Allah has sealed, and it is those who are the heedless.
trans-unit.target: Horiek direnak bere bihotz eta entzumena eta ikusmena baino Ala zigilatu ditu daude, eta horiek, arduragabea da.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, it is they, in the Hereafter, who will be the losers.
trans-unit.target: Zinez dute da, aurrerantzean, nor galtzaile izango da.

trans-unit.source: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled [to renounce their religion] and thereafter fought [for the cause of Allah] and were patient - indeed, your Lord, after that, is Forgiving and Merciful
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, hain zuzen ere, zure Jaun, nor emigratu dute izan dira behartu ondoren dutenei [bere erlijioa uko egin behar] eta hortik aurrera borrokatua [Ala kausa] eta gaixoaren ziren -, hain zuzen ere, zure Jaun, horren ondoren, barkatzea eta Merciful da

trans-unit.source: On the Day when every soul will come disputing for itself, and every soul will be fully compensated for what it did, and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: Eguna denean arima bakoitzak berez disputatzen etorriko da, eta arima guztietan erabat da zer egin, konpentsatu, eta ez dira link.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example: a city which was safe and secure, its provision coming to it in abundance from every location, but it denied the favors of Allah. So Allah made it taste the envelopment of hunger and fear for what they had been doing.
trans-unit.target: Ala eta adibide bat aurkezten du: bertan zen seguru eta segurua hiri bat, bere xedapen da datozen kokapena guztietatik ugaritasuna, baina Allah mesederik ukatu zuen.

trans-unit.source: And there had certainly come to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they denied him; so punishment overtook them while they were wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez izan zalantzarik haiek etorri Messenger bat beren artean batetik, baina hura ukatu dute;

trans-unit.source: Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah, if it is [indeed] Him that you worship.
trans-unit.target: Orduan, zer Ala bada zuretzat [hau da] bidezkoa eta ona jan.

trans-unit.source: He has only forbidden to you dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: He da zuk bakarrik debekatuta hildako animaliak, odola, txerri haragia, eta hori izan den beste eskainitako Allah baino.

trans-unit.source: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez duzu zure hizkuntzak ezertarako aldarrikatzeko buruz esan, "Hau legezkoa da eta hau da legez kanpokoa," faltsutasuna asmatu behar Ala buruz.

trans-unit.source: [It is but] a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: [Baina da] gozamena labur bat, eta zigor mingarria izango dute.

trans-unit.source: And to those who are Jews We have prohibited that which We related to you before. And We did not wrong them [thereby], but they were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Eta direnek juduei debekatua izan dugu eta horrek aurretik lotuta nahi dugu hori.

trans-unit.source: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who have done wrong out of ignorance and then repent after that and correct themselves - indeed, your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, hain zuzen ere, zure Jaunak, egin duten okerreko ezjakintasuna eta gero damu horren ondoren eta zuzendu beraiek horiek -, hain zuzen ere, zure Jaun, hortik aurrera, barkatzea eta Merciful da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Abraham was a [comprehensive] leader, devoutly obedient to Allah, inclining toward truth, and he was not of those who associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Abraham bat [integrala] liderra, debozioz Allah esanekoa izan zen, egia aldera makurtuz, eta ez zen erlazionatuko duten beste batzuk Allah dutenen.

trans-unit.source: [He was] grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: [Zen] Bere mesederik eskertu.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him good in this world, and indeed, in the Hereafter he will be among the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Eta ona mundu honetan hura eman dugu, eta hain zuzen ere, aurrerantzean ere izango zuen leiala artean.

trans-unit.source: Then We revealed to you, [O Muhammad], to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren agerian nahi dugu, [O Muhammad], Abraham erlijioa jarraitzea, egia aldera makurtuz;

trans-unit.source: The sabbath was only appointed for those who differed over it. And indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
trans-unit.target: -Larunbata zen bakarrik nor baino aldeak izendatuak.

trans-unit.source: Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction, and argue with them in a way that is best. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has strayed from His way, and He is most knowing of who is [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Zure Lord jakinduria eta instrukzioa onekin bidea Gonbidatu, eta haiekin argudiatzeko modu bat da onena.

trans-unit.source: And if you punish [an enemy, O believers], punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed. But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient.
trans-unit.target: Eta zigortzeko baduzu [etsai bat, O fededun], eta horrela zuk harmed ziren horren baliokide den zigortzeko.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, [O Muhammad], and your patience is not but through Allah. And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress over what they conspire.
trans-unit.target: Eta pazientzia izan, [O Muhammad], eta pazientzia ez baina Allah bidez.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Ala begirune diotenak eta dutenentzat ona eguile dira batera.

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He who took His Servant by night from al-Masjid al-Haram to al-Masjid al-Aqsa, whose surroundings We have blessed, to show him of Our signs. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Goraipatzen zuen hartu bere Semea gauez al-Masjid al-Haram al-Masjid al-aqsako, zeinaren ingurua bedeinkatu ditugu, hura erakusteko Gure zeinuen izateko.

trans-unit.source: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel that you not take other than Me as Disposer of affairs,
trans-unit.target: Eta Moisesek Idazteunak eman dugu eta orientazio bat egin du Israelgo Children ez duzula hartu Me baino beste aferak, Disposer bezala egiteko,

trans-unit.source: O descendants of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah. Indeed, he was a grateful servant.
trans-unit.target: O egiten dugu [ontzian] Noah dutenak ondorengoak.

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to the Children of Israel in the Scripture that, "You will surely cause corruption on the earth twice, and you will surely reach [a degree of] great haughtiness.
trans-unit.target: Eta transmititu Israelgo Haurren Idazteunean duten, "ziur aski izango duzu sor ustelkeria lurraren gainean bitan dugu, eta ziur aski helduko haughtiness handia [-maila bat].

trans-unit.source: So when the [time of] promise came for the first of them, We sent against you servants of Ours - those of great military might, and they probed [even] into the homes, and it was a promise fulfilled.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, promesa ordua [] horiek lehen iritsi zen, gurea zerbitzariok zure aurka bidaliko dugu - militar handia dezaketenak, eta [are] probed etxeetan sartu ziren, eta promesa bat bete zen.

trans-unit.source: Then We gave back to you a return victory over them. And We reinforced you with wealth and sons and made you more numerous in manpower
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, atzera eman dugu itzulera garaipen bat haien gainean.

trans-unit.source: [And said], "If you do good, you do good for yourselves; and if you do evil, [you do it] to yourselves." Then when the final promise came, [We sent your enemies] to sadden your faces and to enter the temple in Jerusalem, as they entered it the first time, and to destroy what they had taken over with [total] destruction.
trans-unit.target: [Eta esan], "ez duzu ona bada, zuek ona egin duzu;., Eta ez duzu gaizkia bada, [egiten duzun] zuek"

trans-unit.source: [Then Allah said], "It is expected, [if you repent], that your Lord will have mercy upon you. But if you return [to sin], We will return [to punishment]. And We have made Hell, for the disbelievers, a prison-bed."
trans-unit.target: [Ondoren Ala esan], "Espero da, [damu baduzu], hori zure Jaunaren errukia lortuko duzu gainean. Baina itzultzeko baduzu [sin to], dugu egingo itzuliko [zigor]. Eta egin dugu Hell, for

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable and gives good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Qur'an hori zein da egokiena eta fededun leiala eskriturak duten sari handia izan dute egin duten euangelizatzen ematen gidak.

trans-unit.source: And that those who do not believe in the Hereafter - We have prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez duten aurrerantzean sinesten duten - dugu beraientzat prestatu dute zigor mingarri bat.

trans-unit.source: And man supplicates for evil as he supplicates for good, and man is ever hasty.
trans-unit.target: Eta gizon gaiztoak for supplicates supplicates zuen ona gisa, eta gizon inoiz hasty da.

trans-unit.source: And We have made the night and day two signs, and We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day visible that you may seek bounty from your Lord and may know the number of years and the account [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.
trans-unit.target: Eta gau eta egun bi seinaleak egin dugu, eta gau-zeinua ezabatu dugu eta eguna ikusgai sariak zure Lord bilatu dezakezu eta urte kopurua eta kontua [denboraren] Agian seinalea egin.

trans-unit.source: And [for] every person We have imposed his fate upon his neck, and We will produce for him on the Day of Resurrection a record which he will encounter spread open.
trans-unit.target: Eta [da] pertsona bakoitzak bere patua inposatutako ditugu lephora, eta hura izango gara ekoizteko Resurrección erregistro bat Egunean bertan zuen zabaldu irekia egingo du topo orrian.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said], "Read your record. Sufficient is yourself against you this Day as accountant."
trans-unit.target: [Esaten egingo da], "Irakurri errekorra. Nahikoa yourself da zure aurka Day honetan kontulari bezala."

trans-unit.source: Whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul. And whoever errs only errs against it. And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And never would We punish until We sent a messenger.
trans-unit.target: Edonor gidatuta da bakarrik [onerako] bere arima gidatuta.

trans-unit.source: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: Eta hiri bat suntsitu nahi dugu, bere affluent aginteaz dugu baina erronka desobeditzea dute bertan;

trans-unit.source: And how many have We destroyed from the generations after Noah. And sufficient is your Lord, concerning the sins of His servants, as Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Eta zenbat suntsitu Noah ondoren belaunaldietan izan dugu.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should desire the immediate - We hasten for him from it what We will to whom We intend. Then We have made for him Hell, which he will [enter to] burn, censured and banished.
trans-unit.target: Edonor berehalako nahi izatea - lehiatzera berarentzat dugu bertatik zer nori nahi dugu egingo dugu.

trans-unit.source: But whoever desires the Hereafter and exerts the effort due to it while he is a believer - it is those whose effort is ever appreciated [by Allah].
trans-unit.target: Baina duenak aurrerantzean desioak eta ahalegina ikaragarria eragiten duelako sinesten zuen bitartean - direnentzat ahalegina da inoiz estimatzen [Ala by] da.

trans-unit.source: To each [category] We extend - to these and to those - from the gift of your Lord. And never has the gift of your Lord been restricted.
trans-unit.target: bakoitzak [Kategoria] hedatuko dugu - horiek eta horiek - Zure Lord of oparia.

trans-unit.source: Look how We have favored [in provision] some of them over others. But the Hereafter is greater in degrees [of difference] and greater in distinction.
trans-unit.target: Begira zenbat mesede egin ditugu [xedapen] batzuk besteak baino gehiago.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity and [thereby] become censured and forsaken.
trans-unit.target: Ez egin [berdinak jo] Ala jainko beste eta [horrela] bihur zentsuratua eta forsaken.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age [while] with you, say not to them [so much as], "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word.
trans-unit.target: Eta zure Jaun ebatzi du ez duzula gurtzen beregan ezik, eta gurasoei, tratu ona.

trans-unit.source: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small."
trans-unit.target: Eta apaltasuna hegal erruki zien txikiagoa eta esan, "Nire Jauna, erruki beren gañera me ekarri dute sortu gisa [nengoela] txikiak."

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of what is within yourselves. If you should be righteous [in intention] - then indeed He is ever, to the often returning [to Him], Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Zure Lord da gehien zer ceuroc baithan den jakitea.

trans-unit.source: And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully.
trans-unit.target: Eta eman erlatiboa bere eskubidea, eta [ere] pobreen eta bidaztiak, eta ez pasatzeko kaskarrean.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the wasteful are brothers of the devils, and ever has Satan been to his Lord ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, hondakin-ekoizpena deabru anaiak dira, eta inoiz ditu bere Lord esker txarreko izan Satan.

trans-unit.source: And if you [must] turn away from the needy awaiting mercy from your Lord which you expect, then speak to them a gentle word.
trans-unit.target: Eta zuk [behar] piztu kanpoan bada behartsuei zain zure Jauna erruki horrek espero duzu, ondoren, haiekin hitz leuna hitz bat.

trans-unit.source: And do not make your hand [as] chained to your neck or extend it completely and [thereby] become blamed and insolvent.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez dute eskua lepoan kateatuta [jo] edo erabat hedatu da, eta [horrela] bihurtu leporatu eta insolvent.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, zure Jaun hedatzen xedapen norentzat zuen borondateak eta mugatzen [it].

trans-unit.source: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is ever a great sin.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez, ez zure seme-alabak hiltzea pobrezia beldurrez.

trans-unit.source: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez hurbildu legez kontrako sexu-harremanak.
