trans-unit.target: direnak esaten duten, dira "Ez dutenek Ala Messenger batera dira desagertuko arte pasatzeko."

trans-unit.source: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored [for power] will surely expel therefrom the more humble." And to Allah belongs [all] honor, and to His Messenger, and to the believers, but the hypocrites do not know.
trans-unit.target: Esaten dute: "itzuliko bada Al Madinah behar dugu, gehiago ohore [power for] izango da ziur aski gehiago xume horretatik kanporatzeko."

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, let not your wealth and your children divert you from remembrance of Allah. And whoever does that - then those are the losers.
trans-unit.target: O duzu, ordea, sinesten, ez bedi zure aberastasuna eta zure seme-alabak desbideratzen Ala oroitzapena batetik.

trans-unit.source: And spend [in the way of Allah] from what We have provided you before death approaches one of you and he says, "My Lord, if only You would delay me for a brief term so I would give charity and be among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Eta pasatzeko [Ala bidean] zer eman dugu heriotza duzu bat hurbiltzen aurretik, eta dio, "Nire Jauna, bada, ni bakarrik atzeratuko litzateke duzu epe labur bat hain ongintzazko ematen nituen eta leiala artean.

trans-unit.source: But never will Allah delay a soul when its time has come. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Baina inoiz ez Ala arima bat atzeratzen denean bere ordua heldu.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah. To Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs [all] praise, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Whatever zeruan dago eta edozein dela ere lurraren gainean da Allah goraipatzea da.

trans-unit.source: It is He who created you, and among you is the disbeliever, and among you is the believer. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.
trans-unit.target: nork sortu duzu He da, eta zuk artean sinesgogor da, eta zuk artean sinestuna da.

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth and formed you and perfected your forms; and to Him is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: zerua eta lurra egia sortu zuen eta osatutako duzu eta zure forma perfecto;

trans-unit.source: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: zer zerua eta lurra barruan dago daki zuen eta ez daki zer ezkutatzen duzu, eta zer aldarrikatu duzu.

trans-unit.source: Has there not come to you the news of those who disbelieved before? So they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Badu han ez zaudela disbelieved aurretik horietako albiste?

trans-unit.source: That is because their messengers used to come to them with clear evidences, but they said, "Shall human beings guide us?" and disbelieved and turned away. And Allah dispensed [with them]; and Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Hori da bere mezulariak horiek etorriko lekukotza argi batekin erabiltzen delako, baina, esan zuten "Izango gidatuko gaitu gizaki?"

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieve have claimed that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes, by my Lord, you will surely be resurrected; then you will surely be informed of what you did. And that, for Allah, is easy."
trans-unit.target: sinesten dutenek aldarrikatu dituzte ez dira inoiz berpiztuko.

trans-unit.source: So believe in Allah and His Messenger and the Qur'an which We have sent down. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, Allah eta bere Messenger eta horrek bidaliko ditugu behera Qur'an sinesten.

trans-unit.source: The Day He will assemble you for the Day of Assembly - that is the Day of Deprivation. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Eguna eratu beharko zuen Batzar Eguna - Hori ezin izateak Eguna da.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Baina nor disbelieved eta ukatu Gure bertso direnak - horiek Fire laguntzaileak, betiko bertan konplituz dira;

trans-unit.source: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Ez dago zoritxar Ala baimenarekin izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification.
trans-unit.target: Eta obeditzen Ala eta obeditu Messenger;

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Ala - ez jainko ez Bera izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O duzu, ordea, sinesten, hain zuzen ere, zure emazteen artean, eta zure seme-alabak nahi etsaiak dira, beraz, kontuz ibili.

trans-unit.source: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Zure aberastasuna eta zure seme-alabak dira, baina epaiketa bat, eta Ala sari handia berarekin ditu.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah]; it is better for your selves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, beldur Allah bezainbeste gai zara eta entzun eta errespetatu eta pasatzeko [Ala bidean] bezala;

trans-unit.source: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: mailegua duzu Ala bada preciosqui mailegu bat, biderkatu egingo zuen zuretzat eta barkatzen duzu.

trans-unit.source: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: ikusezin Jakile eta lekuko, baliteke ere goraipatzen, Jakituna.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, when you [Muslims] divorce women, divorce them for [the commencement of] their waiting period and keep count of the waiting period, and fear Allah, your Lord. Do not turn them out of their [husbands'] houses, nor should they [themselves] leave [during that period] unless they are committing a clear immorality. And those are the limits [set by] Allah. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah has certainly wronged himself. You know not; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a [different] matter.
trans-unit.target: O Profeta, duzunean [musulmanen] dibortzio emakumeak, dibortziatzeko horiek beren itxarote epea [hasi] eta itxarote epea zenbaketa mantentzeko, eta beldur Ala, zure Jaunak.

trans-unit.source: And when they have [nearly] fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or part with them according to acceptable terms. And bring to witness two just men from among you and establish the testimony for [the acceptance of] Allah. That is instructed to whoever should believe in Allah and the Last day. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz izan dute [ia] bere epe bete, bai atxikitzen dituzten terminoak onargarria edo onargarria terminoen arabera haiekin parte arabera.

trans-unit.source: And will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.
trans-unit.target: Eta egingo zion ematen non ez zuen espero zen.

trans-unit.source: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and [also for] those who have not menstruated. And for those who are pregnant, their term is until they give birth. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease.
trans-unit.target: Eta orain ez betetzea espero menstruation zure emakumeen artean horiek - zalantza izanez gero, ondoren, euren epea hiru hilabetekoa, eta [ere] ez dute menstruated dutenentzat da.

trans-unit.source: That is the command of Allah, which He has sent down to you; and whoever fears Allah - He will remove for him his misdeeds and make great for him his reward.
trans-unit.target: Hori Ala, horrek berak bidali du behera egin agindupean dago;

trans-unit.source: Lodge them [in a section] of where you dwell out of your means and do not harm them in order to oppress them. And if they should be pregnant, then spend on them until they give birth. And if they breastfeed for you, then give them their payment and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way; but if you are in discord, then there may breastfeed for the father another woman.
trans-unit.target: Lodge horiek non habitatzen modurik out of you [atal bat ere], eta ez horiek kaltetu ordena horiek zapaltzeko ere.

trans-unit.source: Let a man of wealth spend from his wealth, and he whose provision is restricted - let him spend from what Allah has given him. Allah does not charge a soul except [according to] what He has given it. Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease.
trans-unit.target: Let aberastasuna pasatzeko gizon batek bere aberastasuna batetik, eta zuen bere hornidurak mugatuta dago - utzi pasatzeko zer Ala eman zion zion.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city was insolent toward the command of its Lord and His messengers, so We took it to severe account and punished it with a terrible punishment.
trans-unit.target: Eta zenbat hiria bere Jauna eta bere mezulari agindupean aldera lotsagabe zen, beraz, hartu genuen kontu larria eta zigortu egiten terrible zigor batekin.

trans-unit.source: And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair, and the outcome of its affair was loss.
trans-unit.target: Eta bere afera ondorio txarrak gertatu zitzaidan, eta bere afera emaitza galtzea zen.

trans-unit.source: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment; so fear Allah, O you of understanding who have believed. Allah has sent down to you the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Ala horiek zigor larria prestatuta;

trans-unit.source: [He sent] a Messenger [Muhammad] reciting to you the distinct verses of Allah that He may bring out those who believe and do righteous deeds from darknesses into the light. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will admit him into gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein forever. Allah will have perfected for him a provision.
trans-unit.target: [He bidaliko] Messenger bat [Mahoma] Ala bertso desberdin hori atera daiteke zuen sinesten duten eta leiala eskriturak tonu argia sartu nahi dutenek errezitatuz.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. [His] command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Ala nor zazpi zeruak sortu du eta lurreko, horietako bezalakoa da.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, why do you prohibit [yourself from] what Allah has made lawful for you, seeking the approval of your wives? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O Profeta, zergatik ez debekatzeko duzu [yourself from] Ala zer egin zaitu zilegi, zure emazteak onarpenaren bila?

trans-unit.source: Allah has already ordained for you [Muslims] the dissolution of your oaths. And Allah is your protector, and He is the Knowing, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Ala dagoeneko duzu [musulmanen] zure zin desegiteko for hartuta daude ordenatuta.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a statement; and when she informed [another] of it and Allah showed it to him, he made known part of it and ignored a part. And when he informed her about it, she said, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the Knowing, the Acquainted."
trans-unit.target: Eta [gogoratzen] Profeta bere emazteak adierazpen bat confided denean;

trans-unit.source: If you two [wives] repent to Allah, [it is best], for your hearts have deviated. But if you cooperate against him - then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are [his] assistants.
trans-unit.target: zuk bi [emazteak] damu Ala bada, [hobe da], zure bihotzak desbideratu.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps his Lord, if he divorced you [all], would substitute for him wives better than you - submitting [to Allah], believing, devoutly obedient, repentant, worshipping, and traveling - [ones] previously married and virgins.
trans-unit.target: debozioz esanekoa, damututa, gurtzen, eta ibiltaria [Ala] aurkezteko, sinesteko, - - [direnak] Aurretik ezkondu eta virgina Agian bere Jauna, zuk dibortziatu bada zuen [guztiak], emazteak baino hobeto zion ordezkatuko luke.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which are [appointed] angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them but do what they are commanded.
trans-unit.target: O duzu, ordea, sinesten, babestu zuek eta zure familiak Fire bat zeinen erregaiaren pertsona eta harriak, batetik, zein baino gehiago dira [izendatu] aingeruak, latza eta gogorra;

trans-unit.source: O you who have disbelieved, make no excuses that Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: O duzu nor disbelieved dute, egin Day dagoela aitzakiarik.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance. Perhaps your Lord will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow [on] the Day when Allah will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them and on their right; they will say, "Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent."
trans-unit.target: O duzu, ordea, sinesten, damu Ala damuturik zintzoa batera.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: O Profeta, disbelievers eta itxurazaleek kontra lehiatuko, eta horien gainean egiten gogorretan.

trans-unit.source: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them, so those prophets did not avail them from Allah at all, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who enter."
trans-unit.target: Noeren emaztea eta Lot emaztea den: Ala nor disbelieved horiek adibide bat aurkezten du.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example of those who believed: the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: denean, esan zuen faraoiak, emaztea den: Eta Allah sinesten dutenen adibide bat aurkezten du "Nire Jauna, gertu didazue etxe bat paradisuan eta gorde me faraoiaren eta haren obra eta gorde me wrongdoing pertsona batetik."

trans-unit.source: And [the example of] Mary, the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity, so We blew into [her garment] through Our angel, and she believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures and was of the devoutly obedient.
trans-unit.target: Eta Mary, 'Imran, alaba bere kastitate babesten baitzuen, [adibidea] beraz nintzen [bere arropá] bitartez Gure aingeru sartu dugu, eta uste bere Jauna eta bere Eskrituretako hitz egin zuen eta debozio esanekoa izan zen.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -
trans-unit.target: Zorionekoa zeinen eskuko dominationeric da, eta eskumena da gauza guztiak baino He -

trans-unit.source: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving -
trans-unit.target: [He] sortu zuen heriotza eta bizitza duzun probatzeko [bezala] duzu zein da onena eskritura - eta goraipatzen da, beharbada, barkatzea du -

trans-unit.source: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?
trans-unit.target: [Eta] zazpi zeruak sortu duten geruzetan.

trans-unit.source: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.
trans-unit.target: Orduan itzuli [Zure] vision birritan berriro.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Eta, zalantzarik gabe, edertu dugu hurbilen izarrak zeruan eta egin dituzte [from] horiek zer da deabruén bota dituzte eta beraientzat Blaze zigorra prestatu.

trans-unit.source: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Eta nork bere Lord ere sinesten dutenentzat Hell zigorra da, eta penagarria helmuga.

trans-unit.source: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.
trans-unit.target: Noiz da botatzen dira, bat [dreadful] arnastu entzuten bertatik dute irakin bitartean.

trans-unit.source: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"
trans-unit.target: ia amorruz lehertu zen.

trans-unit.source: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'"
trans-unit.target: Esaten dute egingo, "Bai, Warner bat izan da gurekin etorri, baina ukatu egin dugu eta esan, 'Allah ez da bidali behera ezer. Ez zaude baina error handia.'"

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."
trans-unit.target: Eta esaten dute egingo, "geundenez entzuten edo arrazoibide bakarrik bada, ez genuke Blaze laguntzaileak artean."

trans-unit.source: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Eta bere bekatua aitortu dute egingo, beraz [da] alienazioa Blaze laguntzaile da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, bere Lord ikusezin beldurra dutenek izango barkamena eta sari handia dute.

trans-unit.source: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Eta ezkutatzen zure hitzaldian edo publizitatea;

trans-unit.source: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?
trans-unit.target: Ez du berak ez sortu Badakizu, Sutil, ezagutu zituen bitartean?

trans-unit.source: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.
trans-unit.target: He da egin duten lurra zuretzat tame du - beraz, bere magaletan artean oinez eta bere xedapen jan - eta beregan berpizkundea da.

trans-unit.source: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?
trans-unit.target: Ez seguru sentitzen duzu He nor zeruan [autoridad antolatzen] ez luke eragin lurra irentsi eta bat-batean sway litzateke?

trans-unit.source: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.
trans-unit.target: Edo ez segurua He duten ceruä ez zenukete aurka bidali harri ekaitz batean [autoridad antolatzen] sentitzen duzu?

trans-unit.source: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: Eta jada horiek ukatu baino lehen, eta nola [terrible] zen My reproach.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Ez dute ez ikusi haiek gainetik txoriak hegoak outspread batera eta [batzuetan] tolestuta?

trans-unit.source: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.
trans-unit.target: Edo nor da hori izan daiteke armada bat duzu beste laguntza eskatzera Gehien Merciful baino?

trans-unit.source: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.
trans-unit.target: Edo nor da zuretzat ematea izan withheld Bere xedapen bada?

trans-unit.source: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?
trans-unit.target: Orduan inork ibiltzen eroria bere aurpegia hobeto gidatua edo nork ibiltzen bide zuzen baten gainean tente da?

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "He da nor izan den azalduz eta zuk entzumena eta ikusmena eta bihotzak egina;. Little zara eskertu"

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "He da nor biderkatu zuk mundu osoan zehar, eta beregan duzu bildu egingo dira."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Eta, esan dute "Noiz promesa hau da, egiazkoa izan behar baduzu?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Ezagutza bakarrik Ala da, eta I am bakarrik argi Warner bat."

trans-unit.source: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call."
trans-unit.target: Baina ikusten dute hurbiltzen, horien aurpegiak disbelieve distressed izango da, eta esango dute, "Hau da, zein da hori deitzeko erabiltzen dituzu."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"
trans-unit.target: Esan, [O Muhammad], "jotzen duzu? Ala nire heriotza eta horiek eragin behar den ala nirekin edo gurekin haren errukia, nor disbelievers babestu dezakete zigor mingarria batetik dute"

trans-unit.source: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Gehien Merciful da; izan beregan uste dugu, eta Bera haren bermea dugu eta izango duzu [etortzen] Badakizu nor den error argi dago.."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"
trans-unit.target: Esan, "jotzen duzu: zure ur sunken bilakatu [lurrera] zen bada, orduan nor ura isurtzen duzu ekarri izan?"

trans-unit.source: Nun. By the pen and what they inscribe,
trans-unit.target: Nun.

trans-unit.source: You are not, [O Muhammad], by the favor of your Lord, a madman.
trans-unit.target: Ez zara, [O Muhammad], zure Jaunak, ero baten faborez.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, zuretzat da sari bat etenik gabe.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, dira bat pertsonaia moral handia duzu.

trans-unit.source: So you will see and they will see
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ikusiko duzu, eta ikusiko dute

trans-unit.source: Which of you is the afflicted [by a devil].
trans-unit.target: Cein da egondako [deabrua].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, zure Jaun da gehien duten joan astray Bere bide batetik ezagutzaile, eta gehienak [asmatu] gidatuta ezagutzaile da.

trans-unit.source: Then do not obey the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Orduan ez denari men egiten.

trans-unit.source: They wish that you would soften [in your position], so they would soften [toward you].
trans-unit.target: hori bigundu nahi duzun [zure postuan] nahi dute, beraz, ez dira bigundu litzateke [duzun norabidean].

trans-unit.source: And do not obey every worthless habitual swearer
trans-unit.target: Eta ez behin worthless ohiko swearer obeditzen

trans-unit.source: [And] scorner, going about with malicious gossip -
trans-unit.target: [Eta] scorner, esamesak maltzurren buruz joan -

trans-unit.source: A preventer of good, transgressing and sinful,
trans-unit.target: ona, urratzaile eta bekatari preventer A,

trans-unit.source: Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender.
trans-unit.target: Krudel, gainera, eta ez legitimoa iruzurtiaren bat.

trans-unit.source: Because he is a possessor of wealth and children,
trans-unit.target: aberastasuna eta haurrak jabe bat delako,

trans-unit.source: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Noiz Gure bertsoak dira errezitatu zion, dio, "antzinako herrien Legends."

trans-unit.source: We will brand him upon the snout.
trans-unit.target: zion marka izango dugu mutur gainean.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have tried them as We tried the companions of the garden, when they swore to cut its fruit in the [early] morning
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, saiatu gara, baratzetik, betiere bere fruta moztu [goiz] goizean zin egin zuten laguntzaile saiatu gara gisa

trans-unit.source: Without making exception.
trans-unit.target: salbuespenik egin gabe.

trans-unit.source: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ez dago lorategian gainean izan zen zure Lord affliction bat Lo zeudela.

trans-unit.source: And it became as though reaped.
trans-unit.target: Eta bildu bagina bezala geratu zen.

trans-unit.source: And they called one another at morning,
trans-unit.target: Eta beste bat goizean deitu dute,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit."
trans-unit.target: [Esatea], "Joan goiz zure laborantza duzun fruta moztu izanez gero."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, while lowering their voices,
trans-unit.target: Beraz, kanpo ezarri dute, berriz, euren ahotsa apalduz,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "There will surely not enter it today upon you [any] poor person."
trans-unit.target: [Esatea], "Han izango da ziur aski ez sartu da gaur you [edozein] pertsona pobreen gainean."

trans-unit.source: And they went early in determination, [assuming themselves] able.
trans-unit.target: Eta determinazio goiz joan ziren, gai [bere burua suposatuz].

trans-unit.source: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost;
trans-unit.target: Baina hori ikussiric, esan dute, "Izan ere, galdu egiten dugu;

trans-unit.source: Rather, we have been deprived."
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, izan dira kenduko dugu. "

trans-unit.source: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [Allah]?' "
trans-unit.target: Horietako gehien moderatua esan du, "Ez al nizun esan nahi baita, 'Zergatik ez duzue goretsiko [Ala]?'

trans-unit.source: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Esan zuten, "goraipatzen da gure Jauna! Izan ere, malhechores izan dugu."

trans-unit.source: Then they approached one another, blaming each other.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, beste bat hurbildu dira, elkarrengandik errua.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Esan zuten, "O gurekin ay, areago zital ginen.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us [one] better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous."
trans-unit.target: Agian gure Jaunaren egingo digu [bat] hura baino hobeto ordezkatuko.

trans-unit.source: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
trans-unit.target: Horrelako zigor [mundu honetako] da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, bere Lord batera zintzoari Pleasure lorategiak daude.

trans-unit.source: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals?
trans-unit.target: Ondoren egingo musulmanen artatzen ditugu gaizkile bezala?

trans-unit.source: What is [the matter] with you? How do you judge?
trans-unit.target: Zer da [Gaia] zurekin?

trans-unit.source: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn
trans-unit.target: Edo ez bertan ikasten duzu Scripturá bat behar duzu

trans-unit.source: That indeed for you is whatever you choose?
trans-unit.target: Zinez zuretzat da edozein aukeratuta?

trans-unit.source: Or do you have oaths [binding] upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge?
trans-unit.target: Edo ez zin [loteslea] Us Bazen, Resurrección eguna arte luzatzeko, hain zuzen ere, zuretzat da edozein dela epaitu behar duzu?

trans-unit.source: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.
trans-unit.target: Eskatu horietako zein, noiz [erreklamazioa], da erantzule.

trans-unit.source: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.
trans-unit.target: Edo ez bazkide izan dira?

trans-unit.source: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but the disbelievers will not be able,
trans-unit.target: Eguna Shin agerian egongo da, eta dute prostration gonbidatuta daude baina disbelievers ezin izango da izan,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound.
trans-unit.target: Haien begiak apal sentitzen, irain horiek estaltzeko.

trans-unit.source: So leave Me, [O Muhammad], with [the matter of] whoever denies the Qur'an. We will progressively lead them [to punishment] from where they do not know.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, utzi Me, [O Muhammad], batera [materia] duenarentzat ukatzen Qur'an.

trans-unit.source: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm.
trans-unit.target: Eta horiek denbora emango dizut.

trans-unit.source: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
trans-unit.target: Edo ez horietako eskatu duzu ordainketa bat, beraz, zor burdened behera dira?

trans-unit.source: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
trans-unit.target: Edo dute [ezagutza] ikusezin, beraz idatzi zuten [it] behera?

trans-unit.source: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muhammad], and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed.
trans-unit.target: Orduan izan zuen Jauna, [O Muhammad] erabakia gaixoaren, eta ez da arraina laguna nahi duzunean deitu zion distressed izan zen bitartean.

trans-unit.source: If not that a favor from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured.
trans-unit.target: ez bere Lord alde bat duten aurreratu zion bada, zuen izan, bistaz shore gainean bota zuen zentsuratua izan zen bitartean.

trans-unit.source: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Eta bere Jaun hura aukeratu eta egin zion iustoén.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad."
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, sinetsi dutenek litzateke ia egin irrist begiak mezua entzuten dute, eta, esan dute "Izan ere, erotuta dago."

trans-unit.source: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Baina ez da munduak oroigarri bat izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: The Inevitable Reality -
trans-unit.target: Saihestezina Reality -

trans-unit.source: What is the Inevitable Reality?
trans-unit.target: Zer da, saihestezina Reality?

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?
trans-unit.target: Eta zer zer saihestezina Errealitatea badakizu egin ahal?

trans-unit.source: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.
trans-unit.target: Thamud eta 'Aad ukatu deigarria Calamity.

trans-unit.source: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].
trans-unit.target: Beraz Thamud dagoen bezala, izugarrizko [eztanda] by zuten suntsitu.

trans-unit.source: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind
trans-unit.target: Eta 'Aad bezala, bat garrasika, haize bortitza by zuten suntsitu

trans-unit.source: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.
trans-unit.target: Zein Ala horiek inposatutako zazpi gau eta segidan zortzi egunez, beraz, bertan palmondo zuhaitz enborrak hutsak balira bezala eroritako jendea ikusi nahi duzun.

trans-unit.source: Then do you see of them any remains?
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, horietako ikusten duzu aztarnarik?

trans-unit.source: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.
trans-unit.target: Eta han izan ziren faraoiaren eta berari eta sin batera irauli hiri baino lehen.

trans-unit.source: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].
trans-unit.target: Eta beren Jaunaren mezularia desobeditu zuten, beraz, horiek konfiskatu zuen desamortizazioarekin bat gainditzen [larritasuna] batera.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, ur gainez denean, zure arbasoek egiten dugu belaontzi batean

trans-unit.source: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.
trans-unit.target: Hori egin genezake zuretzat oroigarri bat eta [dela] kontziente belarrian bat kontziente izango litzateke.

trans-unit.source: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast
trans-unit.target: Orduan, Horn da eztanda bat pizten

trans-unit.source: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -
trans-unit.target: Eta lurra eta mendiak altxatzen dira eta kolpe batekin berdindu -

trans-unit.source: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,
trans-unit.target: Ondoren Day horretan, Resurrección gertatuko da,

trans-unit.source: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.
trans-unit.target: Eta zeruko zatitu egingo [open], egun horretako eri dela.

trans-unit.source: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].
trans-unit.target: Eta Aingueru bere ertzak dira.

trans-unit.source: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.
trans-unit.target: Egun hartan, egingo duzu ikusgai [epaia];

trans-unit.source: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!
trans-unit.target: Beraz, zuen gisa nork bere bere eskuineko eskuan erregistro jakin, esan zuen egingo, "Hemen, irakurri nire errekorra!

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, jakin behar dut nire kontu bilera luke izan dut. "

trans-unit.source: So he will be in a pleasant life -
trans-unit.target: Beraz, bizitza atsegina izango du -

trans-unit.source: In an elevated garden,
trans-unit.target: altxatutako lorategi batean,

trans-unit.source: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.
trans-unit.target: Bere [fruta] jaso dezaten gertu zintzilik.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."
trans-unit.target: [Zituzten kontatu egingo da], "Jan eta gogobetetasuna edan zer idoqui egun iraganean duzu."

trans-unit.source: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record
trans-unit.target: Baina nor da ezker eskuan zuen marka emandako gisa, esan du, "Oh, ez nuen nire errekorra eman nahi dut

trans-unit.source: And had not known what is my account.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez zuten ezagutzen zein den nire kontua da.

trans-unit.source: I wish my death had been the decisive one.
trans-unit.target: nire heriotza izan erabakigarria- izan nahi dut.

trans-unit.source: My wealth has not availed me.
trans-unit.target: Nire aberastasuna ez du baliatu me.

trans-unit.source: Gone from me is my authority."
trans-unit.target: me izatetik nire autoritatea da. "

trans-unit.source: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.
trans-unit.target: [Ala esango du], "Geldi zion eta shackle zion.

trans-unit.source: Then into Hellfire drive him.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren Hellfire sartu gidatzeko zion.

trans-unit.source: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."
trans-unit.target: Ondoren kate baten luzera da hirurogeita hamar besokoa txertatu zion sartu. "

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, ez zuen erabiltzen den Ala, Great gehienek sinesten,

trans-unit.source: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.
trans-unit.target: Ezta pobreak elikatzeko animatzen zuen.

trans-unit.source: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ez dago hura hemen Day honetan edozein dedicado laguna

trans-unit.source: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;
trans-unit.target: Ezta edozein janari zauriak alta ezik;

trans-unit.source: None will eat it except the sinners.
trans-unit.target: Bat ere jan egingo bekatari ezik.

trans-unit.source: So I swear by what you see
trans-unit.target: Beraz zin zer ikusten duzun arabera I

trans-unit.source: And what you do not see
trans-unit.target: Eta zer, ez duzu ikusi

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.
trans-unit.target: [Hori], hain zuzen ere, Qur'an Messenger noble baten hitza.

trans-unit.source: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez da poeta baten hitza;

trans-unit.source: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.
trans-unit.target: Nor igarlea hitza,

trans-unit.source: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: munduen Jaunari batetik Errebelazio bat [da].

trans-unit.source: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,
trans-unit.target: Eta Muhammad k egina bada up Us batzuk [faltsua] esaera buruz,

trans-unit.source: We would have seized him by the right hand;
trans-unit.target: Dugu konfiskatu zukeen hura escu escuinetic;

trans-unit.source: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren harengandik dugu moztu zukeen aorta.

trans-unit.source: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez duzu inor sahiestuko [Us] harengandik da.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, Qur'an zintzoari berreskuratu da.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.
trans-unit.target: Eta, hain zuzen, ezagutzen dugun artean daude denari.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, izango da [kausa bat] damutuko disbelievers gainean.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.
trans-unit.target: Eta hain zuzen ere, ziurtasun egia da.

trans-unit.source: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Beraz goratuko zure Jauna, Great gehienek izenean.

trans-unit.source: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen
trans-unit.target: supplicant A gertatuko lotuak zigorra eskatu zuen

trans-unit.source: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer.
trans-unit.target: disbelievers ere;

trans-unit.source: [It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent.
trans-unit.target: [Da] Ala, igoeran bideetatik jabea from.

trans-unit.source: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.
trans-unit.target: aingeruak eta Espiritua izango beregan igotzeko Day neurri horietatik berrogeita hamar mila urte dagoenean.

trans-unit.source: So be patient with gracious patience.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, izan gracious pazientzia pazientzia.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they see it [as] distant,
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, ikusten dute urrutiko [bezala],

trans-unit.source: But We see it [as] near.
trans-unit.target: Baina ikusten dugu gertu [bezala].

trans-unit.source: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil,
trans-unit.target: Egunean zerua izango murky olioa bezala izango,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will be like wool,
trans-unit.target: Eta mendiak izango artilea bezala izango,

trans-unit.source: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,
trans-unit.target: Eta lagun no elektronikoz [ezer] eskatuko die,

trans-unit.source: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children
trans-unit.target: Dute erakutsiko dira elkarrengandik.

trans-unit.source: And his wife and his brother
trans-unit.target: Eta bere emaztea eta bere anaia

trans-unit.source: And his nearest kindred who shelter him
trans-unit.target: Eta bere hurbilen ahaidetan aterpe hura nor

trans-unit.source: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.
trans-unit.target: Eta duenak lurrean da erabat [so] ondoren, hura gorde izan da.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: A remover of exteriors.
trans-unit.target: kanpoalderako of Remover A.

trans-unit.source: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]
trans-unit.target: Bera izan da, bizkarra jiratu [egiari] eta joan egin zen gonbidatzen ditu [obedientzia]

trans-unit.source: And collected [wealth] and hoarded.
trans-unit.target: Eta bildu [aberastasuna] eta altxor bat.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, gizateriaren sortu zen anxious:

trans-unit.source: When evil touches him, impatient,
trans-unit.target: Noiz gaiztoak ukitzen zion, artega,

trans-unit.source: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz ona ukitzen zion, [it] atxikipen,

trans-unit.source: Except the observers of prayer -
trans-unit.target: Otoitz egiteko begirale izan ezik -

trans-unit.source: Those who are constant in their prayer
trans-unit.target: Nor dira etengabeko beren otoitzean dutenek

trans-unit.source: And those within whose wealth is a known right
trans-unit.target: Eta zeinen aberastasuna barruan horiek jakin eskubide bat da

trans-unit.source: For the petitioner and the deprived -
trans-unit.target: eskatzaileak For eta kenduko -

trans-unit.source: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense
trans-unit.target: Eta renda Eguna sinesten dutenek

trans-unit.source: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -
trans-unit.target: Eta direnek beren Jaunaren zigorra fearful -

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, beren Jaunaren zigorra ez dela bertatik bat da segurua -

trans-unit.source: And those who guard their private parts
trans-unit.target: Eta horiek bere pribatua piezak zaintzen

trans-unit.source: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -
trans-unit.target: bere emazteak edo horiek eskuin eskuan edukitzeko, hain zuzen ere, ez dira bertatik ezik errua al -

trans-unit.source: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -
trans-unit.target: Baina duenarentzat haratago helburua, gero Errebelde dira -

trans-unit.source: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive
trans-unit.target: Eta dutenek euren fondoak eta promesak adi dira

trans-unit.source: And those who are in their testimonies upright
trans-unit.target: Eta dutenek euren testigantzak daude zutik

trans-unit.source: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:
trans-unit.target: Eta nor [arretaz] mantendu dute otoitz horiek:

trans-unit.source: They will be in gardens, honored.
trans-unit.target: egingo lorategietan izan dute, saritua.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad],
trans-unit.target: Beraz, zer [Gaia] da disbelieve, lasterka [from] duzun aurretik daudenekin, [O Muhammad],

trans-unit.source: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups?
trans-unit.target: [Eseri To] [Zure] eskubidea eta on [Zure] talde bereizi utzi?

trans-unit.source: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?
trans-unit.target: horien artean pertsona orok dauka helburu plazer lorategi batean sartzeko?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able
trans-unit.target: Beraz zin Jaunak I [guztiak] altxamenduen eta ezarpen hori, hain zuzen ere gai gara

trans-unit.source: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone.
trans-unit.target: horiek ordezkatzeko horiek baino hobea da;

trans-unit.source: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised -
trans-unit.target: Beraz, utzi hutsalez hizketan eta amuse beraiek euren eguna zein dira agindu dute betetzen dute arte -

trans-unit.source: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening.
trans-unit.target: Eguna egingo hilobiak azaleratzen dute azkar, eraiki ziren idolo bat, presaka aldera balitz bezala.

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.
trans-unit.target: Haien begiak apal sentitzen, irain horiek estaltzeko.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Noah bidaliko dugu bere herriari, [esaten], "Abisatu zure jendeak ez zien dator zigor mingarri bat aurretik."

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Ene herri, hain zuzen ere, naiz argi Warner bat nahi dut,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.
trans-unit.target: [Esatea], Adoratu Ala, beldurra eta obeditu zidan.

trans-unit.source: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "
trans-unit.target: Ala ere barkatuko dizue zure bekatuak eta atzeratuko epe jakin batean zehar.

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.
trans-unit.target: Esan zuen, "Nire Jauna, hain zuzen ere, nire jendea gonbidatu gau eta egun [egiari] dut.

trans-unit.source: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.
trans-unit.target: Baina nire gonbidapena handitu horiek ez hegaldia ezik.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.
trans-unit.target: Eta, hain zuzen, aldi bakoitzean gonbidatutako dut, barkatuko ahal izango duzu, bere behatzak jarri dute beren belarrietan, beraiek estali zituzten beren jantziak batera, iraun, eta [handia] harrokeria harroputz ziren.

trans-unit.source: Then I invited them publicly.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, horiek gonbidatu dut publikoki.

trans-unit.source: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly
trans-unit.target: Orduan iragarri nien eta [ere] haiei isilka ezkutuka

trans-unit.source: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.
trans-unit.target: Eta esan, 'Galdetu zure Jaunaren barkamena.

trans-unit.source: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers
trans-unit.target: bidali zuen izango [euri] zerua zure gainean [etengabeko] dutxetan

trans-unit.source: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.
trans-unit.target: Eta eman handitzeko aberastasuna eta haurrak ere behar duzu, eta zuk lorategiak ematen eta zuk ibaien eskaintzen.

trans-unit.source: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur
trans-unit.target: Zer da [Gaia] zurekin ez duzula Ala [direlako] handitasuna aitortu

trans-unit.source: While He has created you in stages?
trans-unit.target: He sortu du bitartean duzu fasetan?

trans-unit.source: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers
trans-unit.target: Ez al kontuan Ala zazpi zeruak nola sortu du geruzetan

trans-unit.source: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?
trans-unit.target: Eta ilargiak bat [islatzen] argi egin bertan eta eguzkiak kiskaltzen lanpara bat egin?

trans-unit.source: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala eragin ditu lurraren a [progresiboa] hazkunde hazten duzu.

trans-unit.source: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, itzuli egingo zuen sartu eta ateratzeko duzu [beste] erauzketa.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse
trans-unit.target: Eta Ala lurraren hedadura bat egin

trans-unit.source: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "
trans-unit.target: Hori paso errepideetan bertan jarraitu ahal izango duzu. '

trans-unit.source: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.
trans-unit.target: Noah esan, "Nire Jauna, hain zuzen ere, desobeditu didate eta jarraitu egin zion zeinen aberastasuna eta haurrak ez du haren handitzeko galera izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.
trans-unit.target: Eta izugarria konspirazio konspiratu.

trans-unit.source: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.
trans-unit.target: Eta esan, 'Inoiz ez utzi zure jainkoak eta inoiz Wadd edo Suwa utzi' edo Yaghuth eta Ya'uq eta Nasr.

trans-unit.source: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."
trans-unit.target: Eta dagoeneko askok okerreko ustea dute.

trans-unit.source: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.
trans-unit.target: Beren bekatuak ito ziren eta sutara jarri, eta ez aurkitu zuten beraiek Ala laguntzaileak [edozein] gainera.

trans-unit.source: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.
trans-unit.target: Eta Noah esan, "Nire Jauna, ez lurraren gainean uztea batetik disbelievers artean biztanlea.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, bertan uzten baduzu, zure funtzionario engainatuta egingo dute eta ez lezakeenik [guztietan] Gaichtoaren eta [baieztatu] sinesgogor izan ezik.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
trans-unit.target: Nire Jauna, barkatu ni eta nire gurasoak eta duenarentzat nire etxea sinestuna sartzen eta sinesteko gizon eta emakumeen sinesteko.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Esan, [O Muhammad], "Izan da niretzat agerian jinn talde bat entzun eta esan zien:« Izan ere, harrigarria Qur'an bat entzun dugu.

trans-unit.source: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.
trans-unit.target: gidak eskuineko ikastaroa da, eta hura ere uste dugu.

trans-unit.source: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son
trans-unit.target: Eta [irakasten] goraipatzen zuen gure Jaun nobleness da;

trans-unit.source: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.
trans-unit.target: Eta hori gure inozoak bat izan Ala buruz esaten gehiegizko transgresio bat.

trans-unit.source: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.
trans-unit.target: Eta pentsatu genuen gizakiaren eta jinn zela inoiz Ala buruz hitz egiten gezur bat.

trans-unit.source: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez ziren gizateriaren gizonek duten aterpea bilatzen jinn batetik gizonezkoetan, beraz, [bakarra] handitu horiek zama ere.

trans-unit.source: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].
trans-unit.target: Eta pentsatu zuten, pentsatu bezala, Ala ez litzateke inoiz inori [mezulari gisa] bidaltzeko.

trans-unit.source: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.
trans-unit.target: Eta saiatu gara [iristeko] zeruan, baina aurki bete zaintzaile indartsua eta grabatzeko sugarrak batera.

trans-unit.source: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.
trans-unit.target: Eta, bertan eseri postuetan entzumena egiteko erabiltzen dugu, baina duenak entzun egiten orain erretzen bat zelatan zion topatuko.

trans-unit.source: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez dakigu [beraz] txarrak da lurrean edo ala dutenentzat zuzendua beren Lord beraientzat asmoa eskuineko ikastaro bat.

trans-unit.source: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.
trans-unit.target: Eta gure artean dira leiala, eta gure artean dira [besteek], ez;

trans-unit.source: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.
trans-unit.target: Eta jakin dugu ez dela inoiz hutsegitea eragin Ala lurraren gainean bihurtu dugu, eta ezin zion ihes dugu hegaz.

trans-unit.source: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz gidaritzapean entzun genuen, uste genuen.

trans-unit.source: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.
trans-unit.target: Eta gure artean dira musulmanak [Ala aurkezteko ere], eta gure artean dira bidegabea du.

trans-unit.source: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'
trans-unit.target: Baina bidegabea gisa, izango dira, Hell, egurra. '

trans-unit.source: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
trans-unit.target: Eta [Allah agerian] dutela zuzen bazegoen ere, bidean, dugu izan balira, horiek xedapen ugariak

trans-unit.source: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, horiek probatu ditzake dugu bertan.

trans-unit.source: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.
trans-unit.target: Eta [agerian utzi zuen] duten masjids Ala dira, beraz, ez Ala inorekin irekiaz.

trans-unit.source: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz Ala Siervo ziran berarekin supplicating, ia berari buruz trinkotu masa bat bilakatu ziren. "

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."
trans-unit.target: Esan, [O Muhammad], "soilik deitu dut nire Jaun eta ez beregan inorekin lotu."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Izan ere, ez dut zuk kalte edo eskuineko norabidea [boterea] for edukitzeko."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Izan ere, ez da inoiz babesteko me Ala edonork [I desobeditzea behar bada], eta ez du beste aurkitu dut beregan baino babesleku bat.

trans-unit.source: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.
trans-unit.target: Baina [zuretzat daukat] Ala jakinarazpena bakarra, eta bere mezuak "Eta duenak obeditzen Allah eta bere Messenger - ondoren, hain zuzen ere, dagoen Infernuko sua da hura;. Bertan çaudete izango dute betiko.

trans-unit.source: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.
trans-unit.target: [Disbelievers jarraitzeko], arte ikusten dute zein dira agindu dute, ondoren, nor da laguntzaile ahulagoa eta gutxiago kopuruz jakingo dute.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
trans-unit.target: Esan, "Ez dakit zer agindu ari zaren gertu bada, edo nire Jauna izango da diru-laguntza [luze] epea bada."

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone
trans-unit.target: ikusezin Jakile [da], eta ez zuen bere inori ikusezin [ezagutza] dizkio

trans-unit.source: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers
trans-unit.target: nori ezik mezulari zuen onartu du, eta hain zuzen ere, bidaltzen zuen mezulari bakoitzaren aurretik eta atzean behatzaileak

trans-unit.source: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.
trans-unit.target: Hori jakin duten beren Lord of mezuak transmititu izan dute dezake;

trans-unit.source: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],
trans-unit.target: O duzu nor wraps berak [jantzietan],

trans-unit.source: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -
trans-unit.target: ARISE [otoitz egitera] gauean, apur bat izan ezik -

trans-unit.source: Half of it - or subtract from it a little
trans-unit.target: erdia - edo hura apur bat kendu

trans-unit.source: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.
trans-unit.target: Edo gehitu, eta Qur'an errezitatu neurtuta errezitatu batera.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, zure gainean egingo dugu heavy hitza bat bota.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, gaueko ordu gehiago konkurrentzia eta egokiagoa hitz egiteko [bihotza eta mihi] eraginkorra.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, zuretzat egunez luzatzen okupazioa.

trans-unit.source: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.
trans-unit.target: Eta gogoratu, zure Jaunaren izenean, eta zeure burua eskaintzeko beregan [osoa] mirespena.

trans-unit.source: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.
trans-unit.target: [Da] Ekialde eta Mendebaldeko Jauna;

trans-unit.source: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.
trans-unit.target: Eta zer esaten baino pazientzia izan eta horiek saihesteko gracious saihesteko.

trans-unit.source: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.
trans-unit.target: Eta utzi Me [materia] denari du, erraztasunez [bizitzako] koekin, eta utz apur bat atseden horiek.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Us [beraientzat] rekin shackles eta erretzea sua dira

trans-unit.source: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -
trans-unit.target: Eta elikagai hori irabazi ezinik eta zigorra mingarri bat -

trans-unit.source: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.
trans-unit.target: Eguna lurra eta mendiak convulse egingo mendietan eta hondar-pila bat behera botatzen bihurtuko da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, dizugu bidaliko dute Messenger bat duzu haren lekuko baten mezulari bat faraoiari bidalitako gara bezain.

trans-unit.source: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.
trans-unit.target: Baina faraoiak desobeditu mezularia, beraz Heldu dugu hondakintzat bahitzea batekin.

trans-unit.source: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?
trans-unit.target: Ondoren, nola egin daiteke, beldurra duzu sinesten baduzu, Day duten haurrei egingo white- haired?

trans-unit.source: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.
trans-unit.target: Zeruak gain horretatik hautsi egingo da;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, hau oroigarri bat da, beraz duenarentzat borondateak bere Jauna hartu daiteke modu bat.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, zure Jaun daki, [O Muhammad], stand duzula [otoitzean] ia bi gau edo erdia edo horren heren bat, eta heren [hacerlo] duzun dutenek talde bat.

trans-unit.source: O you who covers himself [with a garment],
trans-unit.target: O duzu nor estaltzen berak [garment batekin],

trans-unit.source: Arise and warn
trans-unit.target: Sor eta ohartarazten

trans-unit.source: And your Lord glorify
trans-unit.target: Eta zure Jaun glorify

trans-unit.source: And your clothing purify
trans-unit.target: Eta zure arropa garbitzen

trans-unit.source: And uncleanliness avoid
trans-unit.target: Eta zikina saihesteko

trans-unit.source: And do not confer favor to acquire more
trans-unit.target: Eta ez baitugu gehiago eskuratzeko konferitu

trans-unit.source: But for your Lord be patient.
trans-unit.target: Baina zure Lord da, izan pazientzia.

trans-unit.source: And when the trumpet is blown,
trans-unit.target: Eta noiz tronpeta pizten da,

trans-unit.source: That Day will be a difficult day
trans-unit.target: Eguna duen zaila izango da

trans-unit.source: For the disbelievers - not easy.
trans-unit.target: disbelievers For - ez da erraza.

trans-unit.source: Leave Me with the one I created alone
trans-unit.target: Utzi bat bakarrik, sortu dut

trans-unit.source: And to whom I granted extensive wealth
trans-unit.target: Eta nori aberastasuna zabala ematen dut

trans-unit.source: And children present [with him]
trans-unit.target: Eta haurrak aurkeztuko [berarekin]

trans-unit.source: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].
trans-unit.target: Eta zabaldu [dena] haren aurrean, [bere bizitzaren] arinduz.

trans-unit.source: Then he desires that I should add more.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren nahi zuen hori gehiago gehitu behar dut.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: I will cover him with arduous torment.
trans-unit.target: hura estali egingo dut neketsua oinazeak batera.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, pentsatu zuen eta eztabaidatu.

trans-unit.source: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
trans-unit.target: Beraz deçançát da suntsitu [da] nola zuen eztabaidatu.

trans-unit.source: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren deçançát da suntsitu [da] nola zuen eztabaidatu.

trans-unit.source: Then he considered [again];
trans-unit.target: Ondoren jotzen zuen [berriro];

trans-unit.source: Then he frowned and scowled;
trans-unit.target: Ondoren bekokia zimurtu zuen eta scowled;

trans-unit.source: Then he turned back and was arrogant
trans-unit.target: Gero buelta eman zuen eta harroa zen

trans-unit.source: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].
trans-unit.target: Eta esan zien: «Hau ez da, baina magia imitatua [besteengandik].

trans-unit.source: This is not but the word of a human being."
trans-unit.target: Hau ez baina gizaki baten hitza. "

trans-unit.source: I will drive him into Saqar.
trans-unit.target: hura gidatzeko egingo dut Saqar sartu.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is Saqar?
trans-unit.target: Eta zer da zer Saqar badakizu egin ahal?

trans-unit.source: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],
trans-unit.target: ezer geratzen ematen du, eta ez da ezer [Erre gabeko] uzten,

trans-unit.source: Blackening the skins.
trans-unit.target: larruak belztea.

trans-unit.source: Over it are nineteen [angels].
trans-unit.target: Over hemeretzi [aingeruak] dira.

trans-unit.source: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez dugu Fire keepers egin aingeruak ezik.

trans-unit.source: No! By the moon
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it departs
trans-unit.target: Eta [eta] gaua da abiatzen denean

trans-unit.source: And [by] the morning when it brightens,
trans-unit.target: Eta [eta] goizean alaitu denean,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, Fire handienak [affictionezco] da

trans-unit.source: As a warning to humanity -
trans-unit.target: gizateriaren abisu bat bezala -

trans-unit.source: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.
trans-unit.target: To duenak artean borondateak jarraitzeko edo atzean geratzeko.

trans-unit.source: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained
trans-unit.target: arima bakoitzak, zer irabazi du, atxiki egingo da

trans-unit.source: Except the companions of the right,
trans-unit.target: eskubidea laguntzaile izan ezik,

trans-unit.source: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other
trans-unit.target: [Who izango] lorategietan, elkarrengandik zalantzan

trans-unit.source: About the criminals,
trans-unit.target: gaizkile buruz,

trans-unit.source: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"
trans-unit.target: [Eta horiek eskatuz], "Zer jarri duzu Saqar sartu?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,
trans-unit.target: Esan egingo dute, "Ez dugu otoitz horiek,

trans-unit.source: Nor did we used to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: Ezta pobreak elikatzeko erabiliko dugu.

trans-unit.source: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],
trans-unit.target: Eta diskurtso alferrik sartzen duten arduratzen [it] horiek erabili dugu,

trans-unit.source: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
trans-unit.target: Eta recompense Day ukatzeko erabiltzen dugu

trans-unit.source: Until there came to us the certainty."
trans-unit.target: ez ziurtasuna gurekin etorri zen arte. "

trans-unit.source: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ez da izango ez horiek mesede [edozein] intercessors intercession.

trans-unit.source: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away
trans-unit.target: Orduan, zer da [Gaia] haiekin direla, oroigarria batetik, kanpoan inflexio

trans-unit.source: As if they were alarmed donkeys
trans-unit.target: dute larritu ziren astoak bezala

trans-unit.source: Fleeing from a lion?
trans-unit.target: lehoi bat ihesi?

trans-unit.source: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.
trans-unit.target: Baizik eta, horien artean, pertsona bakoitzak nahi zuen hori eman beharko litzateke Eskrituretako buruz zabaldu.

trans-unit.source: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: Then whoever wills will remember it.
trans-unit.target: Ondoren duenarentzat borondateak gogoratuko du.

trans-unit.source: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.
trans-unit.target: Eta ez dute gogoratzen Allah testamentuak ezik.

trans-unit.source: I swear by the Day of Resurrection
trans-unit.target: Zin Piztuera Eguna by I

trans-unit.source: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].
trans-unit.target: Eta zin reproaching arima [berpizkundea ziurtasuna behar] by dut.

trans-unit.source: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?
trans-unit.target: man du uste dugu ez du bere hezurrak muntatzen?

trans-unit.source: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.
trans-unit.target: Bai.

trans-unit.source: But man desires to continue in sin.
trans-unit.target: Baina gizon desioak sin jarraitzea.

trans-unit.source: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
trans-unit.target: galdetzen zuen, "Noiz Piztuera Eguna da?"

trans-unit.source: So when vision is dazzled
trans-unit.target: Beraz, ikusmen liluratu denean

trans-unit.source: And the moon darkens
trans-unit.target: Eta ilargiak ilundu

trans-unit.source: And the sun and the moon are joined,
trans-unit.target: Eta eguzkia eta ilargia elkartu dira,

trans-unit.source: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"
trans-unit.target: Man izango Eguna dela esan, "Non da [lekua] ihes?"

trans-unit.source: No! There is no refuge.
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.
trans-unit.target: Zure Jauna, egun horretan, iraunkortasuna [lekua] da.

trans-unit.source: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.
trans-unit.target: Man zaie zer bidali zituen eta mantendu Eguna dela.

trans-unit.source: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, gizon, bere contra, lekuko bat izango da,

trans-unit.source: Even if he presents his excuses.
trans-unit.target: bere aitzakiak aurkezten zuen Nahiz.

trans-unit.source: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Ez Eraman ezazu mihia berarekin, [O Muhammad], Qur'an de errezitatu batekin hasten.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, haren Us bere bilduma da [zure bihotzean] eta bere errezitatu [posible egiteko].

trans-unit.source: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.
trans-unit.target: Beraz, esaten dugu, da [Gabriel bidez], gero bere errezitatu jarraitu.

trans-unit.source: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].
trans-unit.target: Ondoren Us Bazen bere argitzea da [ekarri].

trans-unit.source: No! But you love the immediate
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: And leave the Hereafter.
trans-unit.target: Eta aurrerantzean uztea.

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,
trans-unit.target: aurpegiak [batzuk], egun horretan, distiratsu izango da,

trans-unit.source: Looking at their Lord.
trans-unit.target: beren Jaun begira.

trans-unit.source: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,
trans-unit.target: Eta aurpegiak [batzuk], hori Day, bihurrikatuta egingo da,

trans-unit.source: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.
trans-unit.target: Espero ez dagoela horiek [zerbait] backbreaking den egin beharko.

trans-unit.source: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones
trans-unit.target: Ez!

trans-unit.source: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"
trans-unit.target: Eta esaten da, "Nor gazteleraz izango [zion]?"

trans-unit.source: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation
trans-unit.target: Eta hiltzen da zenbait bereizketa ordua [] etorri da hori

trans-unit.source: And the leg is wound about the leg,
trans-unit.target: Eta hanka hanka buruz zauria da,

trans-unit.source: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.
trans-unit.target: Zure Jauna, egun horretan, prozesioa izango da.

trans-unit.source: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.
trans-unit.target: Eta sinesgogor ez zuen uste, ezta izan zuen otoitz.

trans-unit.source: But [instead], he denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: Baina [ordez], ukatu zuen eta bizkarra eman.

trans-unit.source: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].
trans-unit.target: Eta, ondoren, joan bere herriarekin zuen, swaggering [harrotasunez].

trans-unit.source: Woe to you, and woe!
trans-unit.target: Ai zuek, eta ay!

trans-unit.source: Then woe to you, and woe!
trans-unit.target: Ondoren Ai zuek, eta ay!

trans-unit.source: Does man think that he will be left neglected?
trans-unit.target: man du uste zuen utzi egingo ahaztutako?

trans-unit.source: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?
trans-unit.target: Ez al zuen semen batetik espermatozoide bat izan igortzen?

trans-unit.source: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]
trans-unit.target: Ondoren gozoaz Clot bat izan zen, eta [Ala] sortu [bere inprimaki] eta proportziozko [zion]

trans-unit.source: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.
trans-unit.target: Eta bi lagunekin, gizonezkoak eta emakumezkoak zion egina.

trans-unit.source: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?
trans-unit.target: Ez al da hori [Sortzailea] Able bizitza emateko hildakoak?

trans-unit.source: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?
trans-unit.target: Badu han [Ez] gizona etorri haren denbora-tarte bat denean ez zen gauza bat [are] aipatu?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, gizona sortu dugu espermatozoide-tanta nahasketa bat bera saiatu ahal izango dugu, batetik;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, hura gidatuta bidea dugu, izan zuen eskertuko edo izan zuen esker txarrekoa.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, dugu disbelievers kateak eta shackles eta Blaze bat prestatu dute.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, leiala izango kopa [ardo] a zeinen nahasketa Kafur da edatea,

trans-unit.source: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].
trans-unit.target: Udaberrian A horietatik [leiala] Ala zerbitzariei edango;

trans-unit.source: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
trans-unit.target: Dute [daude dutenentzat] betetzeko [bere] vows eta Day bat zeinen gaiztoak hedatuago egongo beldur.

trans-unit.source: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
trans-unit.target: Eta janaria ematen dute maitasun gorabehera behartsuei, umezurtzak, eta gatibu den,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
trans-unit.target: [Esatea], "zuri jaten dugu Ala aurpegia duen bakarra da. Ez saririk edo esker ona nahi dugu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."
trans-unit.target: Izan ere, beldurra gure Jauna soila eta distressful batetik Day bat dugu. "

trans-unit.source: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness
trans-unit.target: Beraz, Ala horiek babestu egingo Eguna dela gaiztoak eta radiance eta zoriontasuna ematen diegu

trans-unit.source: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].
trans-unit.target: Eta horiek saritzea da zer pazientziaz jasan [duten] lorategi bat [paradisuan] eta zetazko [jantziak] dute.

trans-unit.source: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.
trans-unit.target: [Izango dute] bertan etzandako appaindua: sofan.

trans-unit.source: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
trans-unit.target: Eta gertu, gainean duen bere tonu, eta bere [fruta] jaso dezaten betez jaitsi ahal izango dira.
